12946 NvU32 surfaceHandle;
12947 NvU64 gpuVAStart;
12948 NvU64 gpuVASize;
12949} NVAPI_UAV_INFO_V1;
12950
12951typedef struct
12952{
12953 NvU32 version;
12954 NvU32 surfaceHandle;
12955 NvU64 gpuVAStart;
12956 NvU64 gpuVASize;
12957 NvU64 outFlags;
12958} NVAPI_UAV_INFO_V2;
12959
12960#define NVAPI_UAV_INFO_VER1 1
12961#define NVAPI_UAV_INFO_VER2 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(NVAPI_UAV_INFO_V2, 2)
12962
12963#define NVAPI_UAV_INFO_VER NVAPI_UAV_INFO_VER2
12964typedef NVAPI_UAV_INFO_V2 NVAPI_UAV_INFO;
12965
12966NVAPI_INTERFACE NvAPI_D3D12_CaptureUAVInfo(__in ID3D12Device* pDevice,
12967 __out NVAPI_UAV_INFO *pUAVInfo);
12968
12969#endif //defined(__cplusplus) && defined(__d3d12_h__)
12970
12971
12972#if defined(__cplusplus) && defined(__d3d11_h__)
12973typedef struct
12974{
12975 NvU32 version;
12976 NVDX_ObjectHandle hResource;
12977 NvU64 gpuVAStart;
12978 NvU64 gpuVASize;
12979} NV_GET_GPU_VIRTUAL_ADDRESS_V1;
12980
12981#define NV_GET_GPU_VIRTUAL_ADDRESS_VER1 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(NV_GET_GPU_VIRTUAL_ADDRESS_V1, 1)
12982#define NV_GET_GPU_VIRTUAL_ADDRESS_VER NV_GET_GPU_VIRTUAL_ADDRESS_VER1
12983#define NV_GET_GPU_VIRTUAL_ADDRESS NV_GET_GPU_VIRTUAL_ADDRESS_V1
12984
12987// Experimental API for internal use. DO NOT USE!
12988NVAPI_INTERFACE NvAPI_D3D11_GetResourceGPUVirtualAddressEx(__in ID3D11Device *pDevice,
12989 __inout NV_GET_GPU_VIRTUAL_ADDRESS *pParams);
12990
12991
12992#endif //defined(__cplusplus) && defined(__d3d11_h__)
12993
12994
12995
12996#if defined (__cplusplus) && (defined(__d3d11_h__) || defined(__d3d12_h__))
12998//
12999// MetaCommands common defines
13000//
13002//
13004#pragma pack(push, 4)
13005
13006enum NV_D3D_GRAPHICS_STATES
13007{
13008 NV_D3D_GRAPHICS_STATE_NONE = 0 ,
13009 NV_D3D_GRAPHICS_STATE_IA_VERTEX_BUFFERS = (1 << 0),
13010 NV_D3D_GRAPHICS_STATE_IA_INDEX_BUFFER = (1 << 1),
13011 NV_D3D_GRAPHICS_STATE_IA_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY = (1 << 2),
13012 NV_D3D_GRAPHICS_STATE_DESCRIPTOR_HEAP = (1 << 3),
13013 NV_D3D_GRAPHICS_STATE_GRAPHICS_ROOT_SIGNATURE = (1 << 4),
13014 NV_D3D_GRAPHICS_STATE_COMPUTE_ROOT_SIGNATURE = (1 << 5),
13015 NV_D3D_GRAPHICS_STATE_RS_VIEWPORTS = (1 << 6),
13016 NV_D3D_GRAPHICS_STATE_RS_SCISSOR_RECTS = (1 << 7),
13017 NV_D3D_GRAPHICS_STATE_PREDICATION = (1 << 8),
13018 NV_D3D_GRAPHICS_STATE_OM_RENDER_TARGETS = (1 << 9),
13019 NV_D3D_GRAPHICS_STATE_OM_STENCIL_REF = (1 << 10),
13020 NV_D3D_GRAPHICS_STATE_OM_BLEND_FACTOR = (1 << 11),
13021 NV_D3D_GRAPHICS_STATE_PIPELINE_STATE = (1 << 12),
13022 NV_D3D_GRAPHICS_STATE_SO_TARGETS = (1 << 13),
13023 NV_D3D_GRAPHICS_STATE_OM_DEPTH_BOUNDS = (1 << 14),
13024 NV_D3D_GRAPHICS_STATE_SAMPLE_POSITIONS = (1 << 15),
13025 NV_D3D_GRAPHICS_STATE_VIEW_INSTANCE_MASK = (1 << 16),
13026};
13027
13028struct NVAPI_META_COMMAND_DESC
13029{
13030 GUID Id;
13031 LPCWSTR Name;
13032
13033 // states that the initialization and execution of the metacommand will dirty
13034 NV_D3D_GRAPHICS_STATES InitializationDirtyState;
13035 NV_D3D_GRAPHICS_STATES ExecutionDirtyState;
13036};
13037
13038typedef NvU64 NV_META_COMMAND_BOOL;
13039
13040#define NV_META_COMMAND_MAX_TENSOR_DIM 5
13041// dimensions (Size and Stride) are always indexed this way, irrespective of NV_META_COMMAND_LAYOUT
13042// For DimensionCount = 5: N, C, D, H, W
13043// For DimensionCount = 4: N, C, H, W
13044
13045
13046#define NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_MAX_PARAMS 2
13047
13048#if __cplusplus >= 201103L
13049
13050#define compile_time_assert(b) static_assert((b), "Compile time assertion failed: "#b)
13051
13052enum NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE : NvU64
13053{
13054 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE_FLOAT32,
13055 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE_FLOAT16,
13056 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE_UINT32,
13057
13058 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE_COUNT,
13059};
13060
13061
13062enum NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_LAYOUT : NvU64
13063{
13064 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_LAYOUT_UNKNOWN, // opaque HW-native layout
13065 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_LAYOUT_STANDARD, // NCDHW - planar / row major layout (width is inner-most dimension, batch-size N is the outermost)
13066 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_LAYOUT_COUNT,
13067};
13068
13069enum NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_FLAGS : NvU64
13070{
13071 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_FLAG_NONE = 0,
13072 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_FLAG_DATA_STATIC = 0x1, // data pointed by the tensor is static (i.e, won't be modified after command list recording)
13073};
13074
13075enum NV_META_COMMAND_PRECISION : NvU64
13076{
13077 NV_META_COMMAND_PRECISION_FLOAT32,
13078 NV_META_COMMAND_PRECISION_FLOAT16,
13079 NV_META_COMMAND_PRECISION_MUL_FLOAT16_ADD_FLOAT32,
13080
13081 NV_META_COMMAND_PRECISION_COUNT,
13082};
13083
13084struct NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_DESC
13085{
13086 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE DataType;
13087 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_LAYOUT Layout;
13088 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_FLAGS Flags;
13089 NvU64 DimensionCount; // 4 or 5
13090 NvU64 Size[NV_META_COMMAND_MAX_TENSOR_DIM];
13091 NvU64 Stride[NV_META_COMMAND_MAX_TENSOR_DIM]; // only used with NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_LAYOUT_STANDARD
13092};
13093
13094enum NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION : NvU64
13095{
13096 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_ELU,
13097 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_HARDMAX,
13098 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_HARD_SIGMOID,
13099 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_IDENTITY,
13100 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_LEAKY_RELU,
13101 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_LINEAR,
13102 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_LOG_SOFTMAX,
13103 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_PARAMETERIZED_RELU,
13104 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_PARAMETRIC_SOFTPLUS,
13105 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_RELU,
13106 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_SCALED_ELU,
13107 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_SCALED_TANH,
13108 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_SIGMOID,
13109 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_SOFTMAX,
13110 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_SOFTPLUS,
13111 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_SOFTSIGN,
13112 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_TANH,
13113 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_THRESHOLDED_RELU,
13114
13115 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_COUNT,
13116};
13117
13118struct NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_DESC
13119{
13120 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION Function;
13121 float Params[NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_MAX_PARAMS];
13122};
13123
13124#else
13125
13126#define compile_time_assert(b) typedef char compile_time_assertion_failed_in_line_##__LINE__[(b)?1:-1]
13127
13128enum NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE
13129{
13130 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE_FLOAT32,
13131 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE_FLOAT16,
13132 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE_UINT32,
13133
13134 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE_COUNT,
13135};
13136
13137
13138enum NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_LAYOUT
13139{
13140 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_LAYOUT_UNKNOWN, // opaque HW-native layout
13141 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_LAYOUT_STANDARD, // NCDHW - planar / row major layout (width is inner-most dimension, batch-size N is the outermost)
13142 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_LAYOUT_COUNT,
13143};
13144
13145enum NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_FLAGS
13146{
13147 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_FLAG_NONE = 0,
13148 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_FLAG_DATA_STATIC = 0x1, // data pointed by the tensor is static (i.e, won't be modified after command list recording)
13149};
13150
13151enum NV_META_COMMAND_PRECISION
13152{
13153 NV_META_COMMAND_PRECISION_FLOAT32,
13154 NV_META_COMMAND_PRECISION_FLOAT16,
13155 NV_META_COMMAND_PRECISION_MUL_FLOAT16_ADD_FLOAT32,
13156
13157 NV_META_COMMAND_PRECISION_COUNT,
13158};
13159
13160struct NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_DESC
13161{
13162 NvU64 DataType; // NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE
13163 NvU64 Layout; // NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_LAYOUT
13164 NvU64 Flags; // NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_FLAGS
13165 NvU64 DimensionCount; // 4 or 5
13166 NvU64 Size[NV_META_COMMAND_MAX_TENSOR_DIM];
13167 NvU64 Stride[NV_META_COMMAND_MAX_TENSOR_DIM]; // only used with NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_LAYOUT_STANDARD
13168};
13169
13170enum NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION
13171{
13172 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_ELU,
13173 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_HARDMAX,
13174 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_HARD_SIGMOID,
13175 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_IDENTITY,
13176 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_LEAKY_RELU,
13177 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_LINEAR,
13178 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_LOG_SOFTMAX,
13179 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_PARAMETERIZED_RELU,
13180 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_PARAMETRIC_SOFTPLUS,
13181 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_RELU,
13182 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_SCALED_ELU,
13183 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_SCALED_TANH,
13184 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_SIGMOID,
13185 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_SOFTMAX,
13186 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_SOFTPLUS,
13187 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_SOFTSIGN,
13188 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_TANH,
13189 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_THRESHOLDED_RELU,
13190
13191 NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION_COUNT,
13192};
13193
13194struct NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_DESC
13195{
13196 NvU64 Function; // NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_FUNCTION
13197 float Params[NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_MAX_PARAMS];
13198};
13199
13200#endif
13201
13202struct NV_META_COMMAND_OPTIONAL_TENSOR_DESC : NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_DESC
13203{
13204 // true when the tensor isn't needed (e.g, bias is optional)
13205 NV_META_COMMAND_BOOL IsNull;
13206};
13207
13208
13209struct NV_META_COMMAND_OPTIONAL_ACTIVATION_DESC : NV_META_COMMAND_ACTIVATION_DESC
13210{
13211 // true when activation isn't needed
13212 NV_META_COMMAND_BOOL IsNull;
13213};
13214
13215
13216enum NV_META_COMMAND_PADDING_MODE
13217{
13218 NV_META_COMMAND_PADDING_ZEROS,
13219 NV_META_COMMAND_PADDING_MIRROR,
13220 NV_META_COMMAND_PADDING_CLAMP,
13221 NV_META_COMMAND_PADDING_CONSTANT,
13222
13223 NV_META_COMMAND_PADDING_COUNT,
13224};
13225
13226struct NV_META_COMMAND_PADDING_DESC
13227{
13228 NV_META_COMMAND_PADDING_MODE Mode;
13229
13230 // used with NV_META_COMMAND_PADDING_CONSTANT
13231 float ConstantPadVal;
13232};
13233
13234// use this enum to query resource sizes using GetRequiredParameterResourceSize() call
13235enum NV_META_COMMAND_RESOURCE_TYPE
13236{
13237 NV_META_COMMAND_RESOURCE_TYPE_INPUT = 0,
13238 NV_META_COMMAND_RESOURCE_TYPE_OUTPUT = 1,
13239
13240 NV_META_COMMAND_RESOURCE_TYPE_FILTER = 2,
13241 NV_META_COMMAND_RESOURCE_TYPE_WEIGHT = 2,
13242 NV_META_COMMAND_RESOURCE_TYPE_BIAS = 3,
13243
13244 NV_META_COMMAND_RESOURCE_TYPE_MATRIX_A = 0,
13245 NV_META_COMMAND_RESOURCE_TYPE_MATRIX_B = 2,
13246 NV_META_COMMAND_RESOURCE_TYPE_MATRIX_C = 3,
13247
13248 NV_META_COMMAND_RESOURCE_TYPE_PERSISTENT = 4,
13249 NV_META_COMMAND_RESOURCE_TYPE_TEMPORARY = 5,
13250};
13251
13252
13253// Extended version of convolution operation that performs:
13254//
13255// y = act ( alpha1 * conv(x) + alpha2 * z + bias )
13256//
13257// alpha1 and alpha2 are either scalars or if PerChannelScaling is TRUE, they are vectors of
13258// same dimension as the bias tensor (vector of size equal to number of output channels)
13259//
13260// z (SkipConnectionResource) has same dimension as output tensor y (OutputResource).
13261
13262static const GUID MetaCommand_ConvolutionEx =
13263{ 0xa7666f1e, 0x9c55, 0x47ee, { 0x9e, 0xb3, 0xe1, 0x62, 0x0, 0x92, 0xd1, 0xe9 } };
13264
13265#define NV_META_COMMAND_NUM_SPATIAL_DIM 3
13266// D, H, W when DimensionCount is 3
13267// H, W when DimensionCount is 2
13268
13269
13270#if __cplusplus >= 201103L
13271enum NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_DIRECTION : NvU64
13272{
13273 NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_DIRECTION_FORWARD, // Corresponds to regular Convolution
13274 NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_DIRECTION_BACKWARD, // Corresponds to ConvolutionTranspose
13275
13276 NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_DIRECTION_COUNT,
13277};
13278
13279enum NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_MODE : NvU64
13280{
13281 NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_MODE_CONVOLUTION,
13282 NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_MODE_CROSS_CORRELATION,
13283
13284 NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_MODE_COUNT,
13285};
13286
13287struct NV_META_COMMAND_CREATE_CONVOLUTION_EX_DESC
13288{
13289 // Descriptor of the input tensor
13290 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_DESC DescIn;
13291
13292 // Descriptor of the tensor acting as the filter kernel
13293 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_DESC DescFilter;
13294
13295 // Descriptor of the optional bias tensor
13296 NV_META_COMMAND_OPTIONAL_TENSOR_DESC DescBias;
13297
13298 // Descriptor of the output tensor
13299 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_DESC DescOut;
13300
13301 // Convolution mode (CROSS_CORRELATION or CONVOLUTION)
13302 NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_MODE Mode;
13303
13304 // Convolution direction (FORWARD or BACKWARD)
13305 NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_DIRECTION Direction;
13306
13307 // Precision at which convolution is done
13308 NV_META_COMMAND_PRECISION Precision;
13309
13310 // Optional activation function
13311 NV_META_COMMAND_OPTIONAL_ACTIVATION_DESC Activation;
13312
13313 // Padding mode (only used when output tensor dimensions are different from input tensor dimensions)
13314 NV_META_COMMAND_PADDING_DESC Padding;
13315
13316 // enables per channel scaling i.e, use Alpha1Resource and Alpha2Resource
13317 // instead of Alpha1 and Alpha2 below
13318 NV_META_COMMAND_BOOL PerChannelScaling;
13319
13320 // scaling factors used when PerChannelScaling is FALSE
13321 // set Alpha1 = 1.0f, Alpha2 = 0.0f for simple convolutions
13322 // that don't need scaling or skip connection
13323 float Alpha1;
13324 float Alpha2;
13325
13326 // Strides for the filter kernel position
13327 NvU64 Stride[NV_META_COMMAND_NUM_SPATIAL_DIM];
13328
13329 // The distance per dimension between elements that are multiplied
13330 NvU64 Dilation[NV_META_COMMAND_NUM_SPATIAL_DIM];
13331
13332 // Padding at the start of each dimension
13333 NvU64 StartPadding[NV_META_COMMAND_NUM_SPATIAL_DIM];
13334
13335 // Padding at the end of each dimension
13336 NvU64 EndPadding[NV_META_COMMAND_NUM_SPATIAL_DIM];
13337
13338 // Number of dimensions to which convolution occurs (2 or 3)
13339 NvU64 DimensionCount;
13340
13341 // Number of channel groups convolved independently
13342 NvU64 GroupCount;
13343};
13344
13345#else
13346
13347enum NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_DIRECTION
13348{
13349 NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_DIRECTION_FORWARD, // Corresponds to regular Convolution
13350 NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_DIRECTION_BACKWARD, // Corresponds to ConvolutionTranspose
13351
13352 NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_DIRECTION_COUNT,
13353};
13354
13355enum NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_MODE
13356{
13357 NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_MODE_CONVOLUTION,
13358 NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_MODE_CROSS_CORRELATION,
13359
13360 NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_MODE_COUNT,
13361};
13362
13363struct NV_META_COMMAND_CREATE_CONVOLUTION_EX_DESC
13364{
13365 // Descriptor of the input tensor
13366 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_DESC DescIn;
13367
13368 // Descriptor of the tensor acting as the filter kernel
13369 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_DESC DescFilter;
13370
13371 // Descriptor of the optional bias tensor
13372 NV_META_COMMAND_OPTIONAL_TENSOR_DESC DescBias;
13373
13374 // Descriptor of the output tensor
13375 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_DESC DescOut;
13376
13377 // Convolution mode (CROSS_CORRELATION or CONVOLUTION)
13378 NvU64 Mode; // NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_MODE
13379
13380 // Convolution direction (FORWARD or BACKWARD)
13381 NvU64 Direction; // NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_DIRECTION
13382
13383 // Precision at which convolution is done
13384 NvU64 Precision; // NV_META_COMMAND_PRECISION
13385
13386 // Optional activation function
13387 NV_META_COMMAND_OPTIONAL_ACTIVATION_DESC Activation;
13388
13389 // Padding mode (only used when output tensor dimensions are different from input tensor dimensions)
13390 NV_META_COMMAND_PADDING_DESC Padding;
13391
13392 // enables per channel scaling i.e, use Alpha1Resource and Alpha2Resource
13393 // instead of Alpha1 and Alpha2 below
13394 NV_META_COMMAND_BOOL PerChannelScaling;
13395
13396 // scaling factors used when PerChannelScaling is FALSE
13397 // set Alpha1 = 1.0f, Alpha2 = 0.0f for simple convolutions
13398 // that don't need scaling or skip connection
13399 float Alpha1;
13400 float Alpha2;
13401
13402 // Strides for the filter kernel position
13403 NvU64 Stride[NV_META_COMMAND_NUM_SPATIAL_DIM];
13404
13405 // The distance per dimension between elements that are multiplied
13406 NvU64 Dilation[NV_META_COMMAND_NUM_SPATIAL_DIM];
13407
13408 // Padding at the start of each dimension
13409 NvU64 StartPadding[NV_META_COMMAND_NUM_SPATIAL_DIM];
13410
13411 // Padding at the end of each dimension
13412 NvU64 EndPadding[NV_META_COMMAND_NUM_SPATIAL_DIM];
13413
13414 // Number of dimensions to which convolution occurs (2 or 3)
13415 NvU64 DimensionCount;
13416
13417 // Number of channel groups convolved independently
13418 NvU64 GroupCount;
13419};
13420#endif
13421
13422
13423// Fused Convolution variants
13424
13425// supported combinations right now are:
13426// - Convolution + Max Pooling (also optionally outputs pre-pool data)
13427// - 2x2 upsample + (optional) residual add + Convolution
13428//
13429// other combinations may be exposed in future
13430
13431static const GUID MetaCommand_ConvolutionExFused =
13432{ 0xe1b112eb, 0xdecd, 0x4ff6,{ 0x85, 0xbb, 0x1f, 0xe, 0x3a, 0xb0, 0x4, 0x14 } };
13433
13434
13435enum NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_POOL_MODE
13436{
13437 NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_POOL_MODE_NONE,
13438 NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_POOL_MODE_REDUCTION_MAX,
13439 NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_POOL_MODE_REDUCTION_AVG,
13440 NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_POOL_MODE_REDUCTION_MIN,
13441
13442 NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_POOL_MODE_COUNT,
13443};
13444
13445enum NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_UPSAMPLE_MODE
13446{
13447 NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_UPSAMPLE_MODE_NONE,
13448 NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_UPSAMPLE_MODE_REPLICATE,
13449 NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_UPSAMPLE_MODE_BILINEAR,
13450
13451 NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_UPSAMPLE_MODE_COUNT,
13452};
13453
13454enum NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_SKIP_MODE
13455{
13456 NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_SKIP_MODE_NONE,
13457 NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_SKIP_MODE_ADD,
13458 NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_SKIP_MODE_CONCAT,
13459
13460 NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_SKIP_MODE_COUNT,
13461};
13462
13463struct NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_FUSE_DESC
13464{
13465 NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_POOL_MODE PoolMode;
13466 NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_UPSAMPLE_MODE UpsampleMode;
13467 NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_SKIP_MODE SkipMode;
13468
13469 NV_META_COMMAND_BOOL OutputPrepool; // used with NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_POOL_MODE
13470};
13471
13472// uses same structures for init and execute descriptors
13473// SkipConnectionResource is used to specify the resource for pre-pool data or residual add
13474struct NV_META_COMMAND_CREATE_CONVOLUTION_EX_FUSED_DESC : NV_META_COMMAND_CREATE_CONVOLUTION_EX_DESC
13475{
13476 NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_FUSE_DESC FuseDesc;
13477};
13478
13479// make sure structure sizes match what the driver assumes
13480compile_time_assert(sizeof(NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_DESC) == 112);
13481compile_time_assert(sizeof(NV_META_COMMAND_CREATE_CONVOLUTION_EX_DESC) == 640);
13482compile_time_assert(sizeof(NV_META_COMMAND_CONVOLUTION_FUSE_DESC) == 20);
13483compile_time_assert(sizeof(NV_META_COMMAND_CREATE_CONVOLUTION_EX_FUSED_DESC) == 660);
13484
13485
13486// GEMM (General matrix multiply)
13487//
13488// Y = alpha * t(A) * t(B) + beta * C,
13489//
13490// where t is a matrix transform option
13491//
13492// If C is null, and beta is non-zero, the output
13493// matrix is used as C matrix. i.e, the operation performed is:
13494// Y = alpha * t(A) * t(B) + beta * Y
13495//
13496static const GUID MetaCommand_Gemm =
13497 { 0x8f9ff059, 0xfe72, 0x488e, { 0xa0, 0x66, 0xb1, 0x4e, 0x79, 0x48, 0xec, 0x8 } };
13498
13499#if __cplusplus >= 201103L
13500
13501enum NV_META_COMMAND_MATRIX_TRANSFORM : NvU64
13502{
13503 NV_META_COMMAND_MATRIX_TRANSFORM_NONE,
13504 NV_META_COMMAND_MATRIX_TRANSFORM_TRANSPOSE,
13505
13506 NV_META_COMMAND_MATRIX_TRANSFORM_COUNT,
13507};
13508
13509struct NV_META_COMMAND_CREATE_GEMM_DESC
13510{
13511 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_DESC DescA;
13512 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_DESC DescB;
13513 NV_META_COMMAND_OPTIONAL_TENSOR_DESC DescC;
13514 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_DESC DescOut;
13515 NV_META_COMMAND_PRECISION Precision;
13516
13517 NV_META_COMMAND_MATRIX_TRANSFORM TransA;
13518 NV_META_COMMAND_MATRIX_TRANSFORM TransB;
13519 float Alpha;
13520 float Beta;
13521
13522 NV_META_COMMAND_OPTIONAL_ACTIVATION_DESC Activation;
13523};
13524
13525#else
13526
13527enum NV_META_COMMAND_MATRIX_TRANSFORM
13528{
13529 NV_META_COMMAND_MATRIX_TRANSFORM_NONE,
13530 NV_META_COMMAND_MATRIX_TRANSFORM_TRANSPOSE,
13531
13532 NV_META_COMMAND_MATRIX_TRANSFORM_COUNT,
13533};
13534
13535struct NV_META_COMMAND_CREATE_GEMM_DESC
13536{
13537 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_DESC DescA;
13538 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_DESC DescB;
13539 NV_META_COMMAND_OPTIONAL_TENSOR_DESC DescC;
13540 NV_META_COMMAND_TENSOR_DESC DescOut;
13541 NvU64 Precision; // NV_META_COMMAND_PRECISION
13542
13543 NvU64 TransA; // NV_META_COMMAND_MATRIX_TRANSFORM
13544 NvU64 TransB; // NV_META_COMMAND_MATRIX_TRANSFORM
13545 float Alpha;
13546 float Beta;
13547
13548 NV_META_COMMAND_OPTIONAL_ACTIVATION_DESC Activation;
13549};
13550
13551#endif
13552
13553
13554#pragma pack(pop)
13555
13556#endif // #if defined (__cplusplus) && (defined(__d3d11_h__) || defined(__d3d12_h__))
13557
13558
13559#if defined (__cplusplus) && defined(__d3d11_h__)
13561//
13562// FUNCTION NAME: NvAPI_D3D11_EnumerateMetaCommands
13563//
13565//
13582
13583NVAPI_INTERFACE NvAPI_D3D11_EnumerateMetaCommands(__in ID3D11Device *pDevice,
13584 __inout NvU32 *pNumMetaCommands,
13585 __out_ecount_opt(*pNumMetaCommands) NVAPI_META_COMMAND_DESC *pDescs);
13586
13587#endif //defined(__cplusplus) && defined(__d3d11_h__)
13588
13589
13590
13591#if defined (__cplusplus) && defined(__d3d11_h__)
13593//
13594// FUNCTION NAME: NvAPI_D3D11_CreateMetaCommand
13595//
13597//
13616
13617#pragma pack(push, 4)
13618struct NV_D3D11_META_COMMAND_RESOURCE
13619{
13620 union
13621 {
13622 NVDX_ObjectHandle ResourceHandle; // NVAPI handle of a buffer resource (use NvAPI_D3D11_GetResourceHandle to get this handle)
13623 NvU64 unused; // to get correct sturcutre size on 32 bit builds
13624 };
13625 NvU64 Offset; // offset within the resource in bytes
13626};
13627
13628struct NV_D3D11_META_COMMAND_INITIALIZE_CONVOLUTION_EX_DESC
13629{
13630 // Persistent resource used as scratch space by driver
13631 // it's written at time of init, and read at time of execute
13632 // use GetRequiredParameterResourceSize to query its size
13633 NV_D3D11_META_COMMAND_RESOURCE PersistentResource;
13634};
13635
13636struct NV_D3D11_META_COMMAND_EXECUTE_CONVOLUTION_EX_DESC
13637{
13638 NV_D3D11_META_COMMAND_RESOURCE InputResource;
13639 NV_D3D11_META_COMMAND_RESOURCE FilterResource;
13640 NV_D3D11_META_COMMAND_RESOURCE BiasResource; // optional
13641 NV_D3D11_META_COMMAND_RESOURCE OutputResource;
13642
13643 // Alpha1Resource and Alpha2Resource are used only when
13644 // PerChannelScaling is set. Otherwise the scalars Alpha1/Alpha2 are used
13645 // should have same dimension as bias
13646 NV_D3D11_META_COMMAND_RESOURCE Alpha1Resource;
13647 NV_D3D11_META_COMMAND_RESOURCE Alpha2Resource;
13648
13649 // optional, same dimension/descriptor as output
13650 NV_D3D11_META_COMMAND_RESOURCE SkipConnectionResource;
13651
13652
13653 // should point to same memory that was specified at time of init
13654 NV_D3D11_META_COMMAND_RESOURCE PersistentResource;
13655
13656 // temporary resource used as scratch space by driver
13657 // used for both read and write at the time of execute
13658 // use GetRequiredParameterResourceSize to query its size
13659 NV_D3D11_META_COMMAND_RESOURCE TemporaryResource;
13660};
13661
13662// make sure structure sizes match what the driver assumes
13663compile_time_assert(sizeof(NV_D3D11_META_COMMAND_INITIALIZE_CONVOLUTION_EX_DESC) == 16);
13664compile_time_assert(sizeof(NV_D3D11_META_COMMAND_EXECUTE_CONVOLUTION_EX_DESC) == 144);
13665
13666struct NV_D3D11_META_COMMAND_INITIALIZE_GEMM_DESC
13667{
13668 NV_D3D11_META_COMMAND_RESOURCE PersistentResource;
13669};
13670
13671struct NV_D3D11_META_COMMAND_EXECUTE_GEMM_DESC
13672{
13673 NV_D3D11_META_COMMAND_RESOURCE AResource;
13674 NV_D3D11_META_COMMAND_RESOURCE BResource;
13675 NV_D3D11_META_COMMAND_RESOURCE CResource;
13676 NV_D3D11_META_COMMAND_RESOURCE OutputResource;
13677
13678 NV_D3D11_META_COMMAND_RESOURCE PersistentResource;
13679 NV_D3D11_META_COMMAND_RESOURCE TemporaryResource;
13680};
13681
13682// make sure structure sizes match what the driver assumes
13683compile_time_assert(sizeof(NV_D3D11_META_COMMAND_INITIALIZE_GEMM_DESC) == 16);
13684compile_time_assert(sizeof(NV_D3D11_META_COMMAND_EXECUTE_GEMM_DESC) == 96);
13685
13686
13687#pragma pack(pop)
13688
13689DECLARE_INTERFACE_(__declspec(uuid("00BF193A-117B-42BC-BBCD-E964A0EA4F2B"))ID3D11NvMetaCommand_V1, IUnknown)
13690{
13691 BEGIN_INTERFACE
13692
13693 // *** IUnknown methods ***
13694 STDMETHOD(QueryInterface)(THIS_ REFIID riid, void **ppv) PURE;
13695 STDMETHOD_(ULONG,AddRef)(THIS) PURE;
13696 STDMETHOD_(ULONG,Release)(THIS) PURE;
13697
13698 // ** ID3D11NvMetaCommand methods ***
13699 // Return size of parameter
13700 STDMETHOD(GetRequiredParameterResourceSize)(THIS_ NV_META_COMMAND_RESOURCE_TYPE ResourceType, NvU64 *SizeInBytes) const PURE;
13701
13702 END_INTERFACE
13703};
13704
13705typedef ID3D11NvMetaCommand_V1 ID3D11NvMetaCommand;
13706#define ID3D11NvMetaCommand_VER1 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(IID3D11NvMetaCommand_V1, 1)
13707#define ID3D11NvMetaCommand_VER ID3D11NvMetaCommand_VER1
13708

13710 __in REFGUID CommandId,
13711 __in_bcount(CreationParametersDataSize) const void *pCreationParametersData,
13712 __in NvU32 CreationParametersDataSize,
13713 __out ID3D11NvMetaCommand **ppMetaCommand);
13714
13715#endif //defined(__cplusplus) && defined(__d3d11_h__)

13840
13841#pragma pack(push, 4)
13842struct NV_D3D12_META_COMMAND_INITIALIZE_CONVOLUTION_EX_DESC
13843{
13844 // Persistent resource used as scratch space by driver
13845 // it's written at time of init, and read at time of execute
13846 // use GetRequiredParameterResourceSize to query its size
13847 D3D12_GPU_VIRTUAL_ADDRESS PersistentResource;
13848};
13849
13850struct NV_D3D12_META_COMMAND_EXECUTE_CONVOLUTION_EX_DESC
13851{
13852 D3D12_GPU_VIRTUAL_ADDRESS InputResource;
13853 D3D12_GPU_VIRTUAL_ADDRESS FilterResource;
13854 D3D12_GPU_VIRTUAL_ADDRESS BiasResource; // optional
13855 D3D12_GPU_VIRTUAL_ADDRESS OutputResource;
13856
13857 // Alpha1Resource and Alpha2Resource are used only when
13858 // PerChannelScaling is set. Otherwise the scalars Alpha1/Alpha2 are used
13859 // should have same dimension as bias
13860 D3D12_GPU_VIRTUAL_ADDRESS Alpha1Resource;
13861 D3D12_GPU_VIRTUAL_ADDRESS Alpha2Resource;
13862
13863 // optional, same dimension/descriptor as output
13864 D3D12_GPU_VIRTUAL_ADDRESS SkipConnectionResource;
13865
13866 // should point to same memory that was specified at time of init
13867 D3D12_GPU_VIRTUAL_ADDRESS PersistentResource;
13868
13869 // temporary resource used as scratch space by driver
13870 // both written and read at time of execute
13871 // use GetRequiredParameterResourceSize to query its size
13872 D3D12_GPU_VIRTUAL_ADDRESS TemporaryResource;
13873};
13874
13875// make sure structure sizes match what the driver assumes
13876compile_time_assert(sizeof(NV_D3D12_META_COMMAND_INITIALIZE_CONVOLUTION_EX_DESC) == 8);
13877compile_time_assert(sizeof(NV_D3D12_META_COMMAND_EXECUTE_CONVOLUTION_EX_DESC) == 72);
13878

13880{
13881 NvU64 PersistentResource;
13882};
13883

13885{
13886 NvU64 AResource;
13887 NvU64 BResource;
13888 NvU64 CResource;
13889 NvU64 OutputResource;
13890
13891 NvU64 PersistentResource;
13892 NvU64 TemporaryResource;
13893};
13894

13897compile_time_assert(sizeof(NV_D3D12_META_COMMAND_EXECUTE_GEMM_DESC) == 48);

14034
14035typedef enum {
14036 NV_D3D12_RESOURCE_FLAG_NONE = 0,
14037 NV_D3D12_RESOURCE_FLAG_HTEX = 1,
14038 NV_D3D12_RESOURCE_FLAG_CPUVISIBLE_VIDMEM= 2,
14039} NV_D3D12_RESOURCE_FLAGS;
14040
14041typedef struct _NV_RESOURCE_PARAMS_V1
14042{
14043 NvU32 version;
14044 NV_D3D12_RESOURCE_FLAGS NVResourceFlags;
14045} NV_RESOURCE_PARAMS_V1;
14046
14047#define NV_RESOURCE_PARAMS_VER_1 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(NV_RESOURCE_PARAMS_V1, 1)
14048
14049#define NV_RESOURCE_PARAMS_VER NV_RESOURCE_PARAMS_VER_1

14286//
14287// FUNCTION NAME: NvAPI_D3D11_MultiGPU_GetCaps
14288//
14297typedef struct _NV_MULTIGPU_CAPS_V1
14298{
14299 NvU32 multiGPUVersion;
14300 NvU32 reserved;
14301 NvU32 nTotalGPUs;
14302 NvU32 nSLIGPUs;
14303 NvU32 videoBridgePresent;
14304} NV_MULTIGPU_CAPS_V1, *PNV_MULTIGPU_CAPS_V1;
14305
14306#endif //defined(__cplusplus) && defined(__d3d11_h__)
14307
14310#if defined (__cplusplus) && defined(__d3d11_h__)
14311
14312typedef struct _NV_MULTIGPU_CAPS_V2
14313{
14314 NvU32 multiGPUVersion;
14315 union
14316 {
14317 NvU32 reserved;
14318 NvU32 version;
14319 };
14320 NvU32 nTotalGPUs;
14321 NvU32 nSLIGPUs;
14322 NvU32 videoBridgePresent;
14323 NvU32 NvLinkPresent;
14324 NvU32 fastNvLinkReads;
14325} NV_MULTIGPU_CAPS_V2, *PNV_MULTIGPU_CAPS_V2;
14326
14327#define NV_MULTIGPU_CAPS_VER1 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(NV_MULTIGPU_CAPS_V1, 1)
14328#define NV_MULTIGPU_CAPS_VER2 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(NV_MULTIGPU_CAPS_V2, 2)
14329
14330#define NV_MULTIGPU_CAPS_VER NV_MULTIGPU_CAPS_VER2
14331typedef NV_MULTIGPU_CAPS_V2 NV_MULTIGPU_CAPS;
14332typedef PNV_MULTIGPU_CAPS_V2 PNV_MULTIGPU_CAPS;
14333
14334#endif //defined(__cplusplus) && defined(__d3d11_h__)
14335
14338#if defined (__cplusplus) && defined(__d3d11_h__)
14340

14344#endif

14370#if defined (__cplusplus) && defined(__d3d11_h__)
14372//
14373// FUNCTION NAME: NvAPI_D3D11_CreateMultiGPUDevice
14394
14395
14397
14398#define NVAPI_COPY_ASYNCHRONOUSLY 1
14399#endif //defined(__cplusplus) && defined(__d3d11_h__)
14400
14403#if defined (__cplusplus) && defined(__d3d11_h__)
14404#define NVAPI_COPY_P2P_READ 2
14405#endif //defined(__cplusplus) && defined(__d3d11_h__)
14406
14409#if defined (__cplusplus) && defined(__d3d11_h__)
14410
14411#define NVAPI_CPU_RESOURCE 0xffffffff
14412
14413DECLARE_INTERFACE(ID3D11MultiGPUDevice_V1)
14414{
14416 STDMETHOD_(void,Destroy)(THIS) PURE;
14417 STDMETHOD_(UINT,SetGPUMask)(THIS_ __in UINT GPUMask) PURE;
14418 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,CopySubresourceRegion)(THIS_ __in ID3D11DeviceContext *pContext, __in ID3D11Resource *pDstResource, __in UINT DstSubresource,
14419 __in UINT DstGPUIndex, __in UINT DstX, __in UINT DstY, __in UINT DstZ,
14420 __in ID3D11Resource *pSrcResource, __in UINT SrcSubresource, __in UINT SrcGPUIndex,
14421 __in const D3D11_BOX *pSrcBox, __in UINT ExtendedFlags = 0) PURE;
14422#if defined(__d3d11_1_h__)
14423 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,CopySubresourceRegion1)(THIS_ __in ID3D11DeviceContext1 *pContext1, __in ID3D11Resource *pDstResource, __in UINT DstSubresource,
14424 __in UINT DstGPUIndex, __in UINT DstX, __in UINT DstY, __in UINT DstZ,
14425 __in ID3D11Resource *pSrcResource, __in UINT SrcSubresource, __in UINT SrcGPUIndex,
14426 __in const D3D11_BOX *pSrcBox, __in UINT CopyFlags, __in UINT ExtendedFlags = 0 ) PURE;
14427#else
14428 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,CopySubresourceRegion1)(THIS_ __in void *pContext1, __in ID3D11Resource *pDstResource, __in UINT DstSubresource,
14429 __in UINT DstGPUIndex, __in UINT DstX, __in UINT DstY, __in UINT DstZ,
14430 __in ID3D11Resource *pSrcResource, __in UINT SrcSubresource, __in UINT SrcGPUIndex,
14431 __in const D3D11_BOX *pSrcBox, __in UINT CopyFlags, __in UINT ExtendedFlags = 0 ) PURE;
14432#endif
14433 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,UpdateSubresource)(THIS_ __in ID3D11DeviceContext *pContext,__in ID3D11Resource *pDstResource, __in UINT DstSubresource, __in UINT DstGPUIndex,
14434 __in const D3D11_BOX *pDstBox, __in const void *pSrcData, __in UINT SrcRowPitch, __in UINT SrcDepthPitch) PURE;
14435 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,VSSetConstantBuffers)(THIS_ __in ID3D11DeviceContext *pContext, __in UINT GPUMask, __in UINT StartSlot,
14436 __in UINT NumBuffers, __in ID3D11Buffer *const *ppConstantBuffers,
14437 __in UINT *const pFirstConstant = NULL, __in UINT *const pNumConstants = NULL) PURE;
14438 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,PSSetConstantBuffers)(THIS_ __in ID3D11DeviceContext *pContext, __in UINT GPUMask, __in UINT StartSlot,
14439 __in UINT NumBuffers, __in ID3D11Buffer *const *ppConstantBuffers,
14440 __in UINT *const pFirstConstant = NULL, __in UINT *const pNumConstants = NULL) PURE;
14441 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,GSSetConstantBuffers)(THIS_ __in ID3D11DeviceContext *pContext, __in UINT GPUMask, __in UINT StartSlot,
14442 __in UINT NumBuffers, __in ID3D11Buffer *const *ppConstantBuffers,
14443 __in UINT *const pFirstConstant = NULL, __in UINT *const pNumConstants = NULL) PURE;
14444 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,DSSetConstantBuffers)(THIS_ __in ID3D11DeviceContext *pContext, __in UINT GPUMask, __in UINT StartSlot,
14445 __in UINT NumBuffers, __in ID3D11Buffer *const *ppConstantBuffers,
14446 __in UINT *const pFirstConstant = NULL, __in UINT *const pNumConstants = NULL) PURE;
14447 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,HSSetConstantBuffers)(THIS_ __in ID3D11DeviceContext *pContext, __in UINT GPUMask, __in UINT StartSlot,
14448 __in UINT NumBuffers, __in ID3D11Buffer *const *ppConstantBuffers,
14449 __in UINT *const pFirstConstant = NULL, __in UINT *const pNumConstants = NULL) PURE;
14450 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,CSSetConstantBuffers)(THIS_ __in ID3D11DeviceContext *pContext, __in UINT GPUMask, __in UINT StartSlot,
14451 __in UINT NumBuffers, __in ID3D11Buffer *const *ppConstantBuffers,
14452 __in UINT *const pFirstConstant = NULL, __in UINT *const pNumConstants = NULL) PURE;
14453 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,SetViewports)(THIS_ __in ID3D11DeviceContext *pContext, __in UINT GPUMask, __in UINT NumViewports,
14454 __in const D3D11_VIEWPORT *pViewports) PURE;
14455 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,SetScissorRects)(THIS_ __in ID3D11DeviceContext *pContext, __in UINT GPUMask, __in UINT NumRects,
14456 __in const D3D11_RECT *pRects) PURE;
14457 STDMETHOD_(HRESULT,GetData)(THIS_ __in ID3D11DeviceContext *pContext, __in ID3D11Asynchronous *pAsync, __in UINT GPUIndex,
14458 __out void *pData, __in UINT DataSize, __in UINT GetDataFlags) PURE;
14459#if defined(__d3d11_2_h__)
14460 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,UpdateTiles)(THIS_ __in ID3D11DeviceContext2 *pContext2, __in ID3D11Resource *pDestTiledResource,
14461 __in UINT GPUMask, __in const D3D11_TILED_RESOURCE_COORDINATE *pDestTileRegionStartCoordinate,
14462 __in const D3D11_TILE_REGION_SIZE *pDestTileRegionSize, __in const void *pSourceTileData,
14463 __in UINT Flags) PURE;
14464#else
14465 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,UpdateTiles)(THIS_ __in void *pContext2, __in ID3D11Resource *pDestTiledResource,
14466 __in UINT GPUMask, __in const void *pDestTileRegionStartCoordinate,
14467 __in const void *pDestTileRegionSize, __in const void *pSourceTileData,
14468 __in UINT Flags) PURE;
14469#endif
14470
14471 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,CreateFences)(THIS_ __in UINT count, __out void **ppFences) PURE;
14472 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,SetFence)(THIS_ __in UINT GPUIndex, __in void *hFence, __in UINT64 value) PURE;
14473 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,WaitForFence)(THIS_ __in UINT GPUIMask, __in void *hFence, __in UINT64 value) PURE;
14474 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,FreeFences)(THIS_ __in UINT count, __in void **ppFences) PURE;
14475 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,PresentCompositingConfig )(THIS_ __in IUnknown *pSwapChain, __in UINT GPUMask,
14476 __in const D3D11_RECT *pRects, __in UINT flags) PURE;
14478
14480 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,SetContextGPUMask)(THIS_ __in ID3D11DeviceContext *pContext, __in UINT GPUMask) PURE;
14481 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,GetVideoBridgeStatus)(THIS_ __in IUnknown *pSwapChain, __in UINT* pVideoBridgeStatus) PURE;
14483
14485 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,CreateMultiGPUConstantBuffer)(THIS_ __in const D3D11_BUFFER_DESC *pDesc, __in_opt const D3D11_SUBRESOURCE_DATA **ppInitialData, __out ID3D11Buffer **ppBuffer) PURE;
14486 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,ReleaseMultiGPUConstantBuffer)(THIS_ __in ID3D11Buffer *pBuffer) PURE;
14487
14489 // Following XXSetMGPUConstantBuffers work the same way as DX XXSetConstantBuffers
14490 // The difference is that
14491 // 1. They are setting constant buffers on GPUs that are defined by
14492 // current GPU mask that is set via SetGPUMask.
14493 // 2. For constant buffer created via CreateMultiGPUConstantBuffer these calls set GPU specific constant buffer.
14494 // 3. For regular constant buffers these calls set the same constant buffer on all GPUs defined by 1.
14495 // 4. If these functions are called in deferred context then GPUs are defined as GlobalGPUmask&LocalGPUMask
14496 // where GlobalGPUmask is GPUMask set before CL execution
14497 // and LocalGPUMask is current GPUMask set in CL.
14499 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,VSSetMGPUConstantBuffers)(THIS_ __in ID3D11DeviceContext *pContext, __in UINT StartSlot,
14500 __in UINT NumBuffers, __in ID3D11Buffer *const *ppConstantBuffers) PURE;
14501 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,PSSetMGPUConstantBuffers)(THIS_ __in ID3D11DeviceContext *pContext, __in UINT StartSlot,
14502 __in UINT NumBuffers, __in ID3D11Buffer *const *ppConstantBuffers) PURE;
14503 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,GSSetMGPUConstantBuffers)(THIS_ __in ID3D11DeviceContext *pContext, __in UINT StartSlot,
14504 __in UINT NumBuffers, __in ID3D11Buffer *const *ppConstantBuffers) PURE;
14505 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,DSSetMGPUConstantBuffers)(THIS_ __in ID3D11DeviceContext *pContext, __in UINT StartSlot,
14506 __in UINT NumBuffers, __in ID3D11Buffer *const *ppConstantBuffers) PURE;
14507 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,HSSetMGPUConstantBuffers)(THIS_ __in ID3D11DeviceContext *pContext, __in UINT StartSlot,
14508 __in UINT NumBuffers, __in ID3D11Buffer *const *ppConstantBuffers) PURE;
14509 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,CSSetMGPUConstantBuffers)(THIS_ __in ID3D11DeviceContext *pContext, __in UINT StartSlot,
14510 __in UINT NumBuffers, __in ID3D11Buffer *const *ppConstantBuffers) PURE;
14511
14512 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,UpdateConstantBuffer)(__in ID3D11DeviceContext *pContext, __in ID3D11Buffer *pBuffer, __in const void *pSrcData, __in_opt UINT GPUMask = 0) PURE;
14514};
14515
14517#define FENCE_SYNCHRONIZATION_START(pMultiGPUDevice, hFence, Value, srcGpu, dstGpu) \
14518 pMultiGPUDevice->SetFence(dstGpu, hFence, Value); \
14519 pMultiGPUDevice->WaitForFence(1 << (srcGpu), hFence, Value); \
14520 Value++;
14521
14522#define FENCE_SYNCHRONIZATION_END(pMultiGPUDevice, hFence, Value, srcGpu, dstGpu) \
14523 pMultiGPUDevice->SetFence(srcGpu, hFence, Value); \
14524 pMultiGPUDevice->WaitForFence(1 << (dstGpu), hFence, Value); \
14525 Value++;
14526
14528#define NVAPI_PRESENT_COMPOSITING_CONFIG_FLAG_USE_VIDEO_BRIDGE 0x01
14529#define NVAPI_PRESENT_COMPOSITING_CONFIG_FLAG_CLEAR_OUTBANDS 0x02
14530#define NVAPI_PRESENT_COMPOSITING_CONFIG_FLAG_GET_VIDEO_BRIDGE_STATUS 0x80000000
14531
14532#define NVAPI_VIDEO_BRIDGE_STATUS_AVAILABLE 0
14533#define NVAPI_VIDEO_BRIDGE_STATUS_NOT_AVAILABLE 1
14534#define NVAPI_VIDEO_BRIDGE_STATUS_FAILED_ACCESS 2
14535#define NVAPI_VIDEO_BRIDGE_STATUS_UNKNOWN 3
14536
14537#define NVAPI_ALL_GPUS 0
14538typedef ID3D11MultiGPUDevice_V1 ID3D11MultiGPUDevice;
14539
14540#define ID3D11MultiGPUDevice_VER1 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(ID3D11MultiGPUDevice_V1, 1)
14541#define ID3D11MultiGPUDevice_VER2 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(ID3D11MultiGPUDevice_V1, 2)
14542#define ID3D11MultiGPUDevice_VER3 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(ID3D11MultiGPUDevice_V1, 3)
14543#define ID3D11MultiGPUDevice_VER ID3D11MultiGPUDevice_VER3
14544
14545#define ALL_GPUS 0
14546
14548NVAPI_INTERFACE NvAPI_D3D11_CreateMultiGPUDevice(__in ID3D11Device *pDevice, __in ULONG version, __out ULONG *currentVersion, __out ID3D11MultiGPUDevice **ppD3D11MultiGPUDevice, __in UINT maxGpus=ALL_GPUS);
14549
14550#endif //defined(__cplusplus) && defined(__d3d11_h__)

14700typedef struct _NV_QUERY_MULTIVIEW_SUPPORT_PARAMS_V1
14701{
14702 NvU32 version; // _IN_ parameter struct version
14703 NvU32 bMultiViewSupported : 1; // _OUT_ MultiView supported (Render 4 views in a single pass)
14704 NvU32 bSinglePassStereoSupported : 1; // _OUT_ StereoX supported (Render 2 views in a single pass)
14705 NvU32 bSinglePassStereoXYZWSupported : 1; // _OUT_ StereoXYZW supported (Render 2 views in a single pass)
14706 NvU32 reserved : 29; // _INOUT_ bits reserved for future use
14707} NV_QUERY_MULTIVIEW_SUPPORT_PARAMS_V1;
14708

14800#if defined(__cplusplus) && (defined(_D3D9_H_) || defined(__d3d10_h__) || defined(__d3d10_1_h__) || defined(__d3d11_h__))

14820 __inout NV_QUERY_MODIFIED_W_SUPPORT_PARAMS *pQueryModifiedWSupportedParams);

14822
14825#define NV_MODIFIED_W_MAX_VIEWPORTS 16
14826
14827typedef struct _NV_MODIFIED_W_COEFFICIENTS
14828{
14829 float fA; // A coefficient in w' = w + Ax + By
14830 float fB; // B coefficient in w' = w + Ax + By
14831 float fAReserved; // reserved
14832 float fBReserved; // reserved
14833
14834 float fReserved[2]; // reserved
14835} NV_MODIFIED_W_COEFFICIENTS;
14836
14837typedef struct _NV_MODIFIED_W_PARAMS
14838{
14839 NvU32 version; // parameter struct version
14840 NvU32 numEntries; // number of valid NV_MODIFIED_W_COEFFICIENTS structs in array
14841 NV_MODIFIED_W_COEFFICIENTS modifiedWCoefficients[NV_MODIFIED_W_MAX_VIEWPORTS]; // coefficients
14842
14843 NvU32 id; // reserved
14844 NvU32 reserved[NV_MODIFIED_W_MAX_VIEWPORTS]; // reserved
14845} NV_MODIFIED_W_PARAMS_V1;
14846
14847typedef NV_MODIFIED_W_PARAMS_V1 NV_MODIFIED_W_PARAMS;
14848#define NV_MODIFIED_W_PARAMS_VER1 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(NV_MODIFIED_W_PARAMS_V1, 1)
14849#define NV_MODIFIED_W_PARAMS_VER NV_MODIFIED_W_PARAMS_VER1

14940DECLARE_INTERFACE(ID3DLateLatchObject_V1)
14941{
14942 STDMETHOD_(UINT,Release) (THIS) PURE;
14943 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,Latch) (THIS_ __in IUnknown* pContext = NULL) PURE;
14944 STDMETHOD_(ID3D11Buffer*,GetD3D11Buffer) (THIS_ __in UINT index = 0) PURE;
14945 STDMETHOD_(UINT,GetBufferCount) (THIS) PURE;
14946 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,UpdateData) (THIS_ __in void **ppData) PURE;
14947 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,UpdateData) (THIS_ __in void *pData, __in size_t offset,
14948 __in size_t size, __in UINT index = 0) PURE;
14949};
14950
14953typedef ID3DLateLatchObject_V1 ID3DLateLatchObject;
14954#define ID3DLateLatchObject_VER1 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(ID3DLateLatchObject_V1, 1)
14955#define ID3DLateLatchObject_VER ID3DLateLatchObject_VER1
14956
14957typedef struct _NV_D3D_LATELATCH_OBJECT_DESC_V1
14958{
14959 NvU32 version;
14960 NvU32 numBuffers; // _IN_ Number of LateLatch buffers that the app wants to create.
14961 D3D11_BUFFER_DESC **ppBufferDesc; // _IN_ Description of buffers
14962 ID3DLateLatchObject **ppD3DLateLatchObject; // _Out_ Pointer to created interface
14963} NV_D3D_LATELATCH_OBJECT_DESC_V1;
14964
14965typedef NV_D3D_LATELATCH_OBJECT_DESC_V1 NV_D3D_LATELATCH_OBJECT_DESC;
14966#define NV_D3D_LATELATCH_OBJECT_DESC_VER1 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(NV_D3D_LATELATCH_OBJECT_DESC_V1, 1)
14967#define NV_D3D_LATELATCH_OBJECT_DESC_VER NV_D3D_LATELATCH_OBJECT_DESC_VER1
14968
14970//
14971// FUNCTION NAME: NvAPI_D3D_CreateLateLatchObject
14972//
14988
14989NVAPI_INTERFACE NvAPI_D3D_CreateLateLatchObject(__in IUnknown *pDevice, __inout NV_D3D_LATELATCH_OBJECT_DESC* pLateLatchObjectDesc);
14990
14991#endif // defined(__cplusplus) && (defined(__d3d11_h__))
14992
14993
14994
14995#if defined(__cplusplus) && (defined(__d3d11_h__) || defined(__d3d12_h__))
14998typedef struct _NV_QUERY_LATELATCH_SUPPORT_PARAMS
14999{
15000 NvU32 version;
15001 NvU32 bLateLatchSupported;
15002} NV_QUERY_LATELATCH_SUPPORT_PARAMS_V1;
15003
15004typedef NV_QUERY_LATELATCH_SUPPORT_PARAMS_V1 NV_QUERY_LATELATCH_SUPPORT_PARAMS;
15005#define NV_QUERY_LATELATCH_SUPPORT_PARAMS_VER1 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(NV_QUERY_LATELATCH_SUPPORT_PARAMS_V1, 1)
15006#define NV_QUERY_LATELATCH_SUPPORT_PARAMS_VER NV_QUERY_LATELATCH_SUPPORT_PARAMS_VER1
15007

15010// FUNCTION NAME: NvAPI_D3D_QueryLateLatchSupport

15379#define NV_MAX_NUM_EXCLUSIVE_SCISSOR_RECTS 16

15393{

15397 // \note Max value can be equal to NV_MAX_NUM_EXCLUSIVE_SCISSOR_RECTS
15398 NV_D3D11_EXCLUSIVE_SCISSOR_RECT_DESC_V1 *pRects;
15399} NV_D3D11_EXCLUSIVE_SCISSOR_RECTS_DESC_V1;

15407//
15408// FUNCTION NAME: NvAPI_D3D11_RSSetExclusiveScissorRects
15409//
15430
15431NVAPI_INTERFACE NvAPI_D3D11_RSSetExclusiveScissorRects(__in IUnknown *pContext,
15432 __in NV_D3D11_EXCLUSIVE_SCISSOR_RECTS_DESC *pExclusiveScissorRectsDesc);
15433
15434#endif // defined(__cplusplus) && (defined(__d3d11_h__))
15435
15436#if defined(__cplusplus) && (defined(__d3d11_h__) || defined(__d3d12_h__))
15439
15440#define NV_MAX_PIXEL_SHADING_RATES 16 // Currently only 12 Shading Rates are available
15441#define NV_MAX_NUM_VIEWPORTS 16
15442
15443// Every element in Shading Rate Resource represents the shading rate for all pixels in the corresponding tile
15444// The Shading Rate Resource dimensions must be the bound render target size divided by the tile dimensions (width/height)
15445
15446#define NV_VARIABLE_PIXEL_SHADING_TILE_WIDTH 16 // Width of the tile, in pixels
15447#define NV_VARIABLE_PIXEL_SHADING_TILE_HEIGHT 16 // Height of the tile, in pixels
15448
15449typedef enum
15450{
15451 NV_PIXEL_X0_CULL_RASTER_PIXELS, // No shading, tiles are culled
15452 NV_PIXEL_X16_PER_RASTER_PIXEL, // 16 shading passes per 1 raster pixel
15453 NV_PIXEL_X8_PER_RASTER_PIXEL, // 8 shading passes per 1 raster pixel
15454 NV_PIXEL_X4_PER_RASTER_PIXEL, // 4 shading passes per 1 raster pixel
15455 NV_PIXEL_X2_PER_RASTER_PIXEL, // 2 shading passes per 1 raster pixel
15456 NV_PIXEL_X1_PER_RASTER_PIXEL, // Per-pixel shading
15457 NV_PIXEL_X1_PER_2X1_RASTER_PIXELS, // 1 shading pass per 2 raster pixels
15458 NV_PIXEL_X1_PER_1X2_RASTER_PIXELS, // 1 shading pass per 2 raster pixels
15459 NV_PIXEL_X1_PER_2X2_RASTER_PIXELS, // 1 shading pass per 4 raster pixels
15460 NV_PIXEL_X1_PER_4X2_RASTER_PIXELS, // 1 shading pass per 8 raster pixels
15461 NV_PIXEL_X1_PER_2X4_RASTER_PIXELS, // 1 shading pass per 8 raster pixels
15462 NV_PIXEL_X1_PER_4X4_RASTER_PIXELS // 1 shading pass per 16 raster pixels
15463} NV_PIXEL_SHADING_RATE;
15464#endif // defined(__cplusplus) && (defined(__d3d11_h__) || defined(__d3d12_h__))
15465
15466#if defined(__cplusplus) && (defined(__d3d11_h__))
15467typedef struct _NV_D3D11_VIEWPORT_SHADING_RATE_DESC_V1
15468{
15469 bool enableVariablePixelShadingRate;
15470 NV_PIXEL_SHADING_RATE shadingRateTable[NV_MAX_PIXEL_SHADING_RATES];
15471 // \note Shading Rate Resource View would be populated by application with indices of this table
15472} NV_D3D11_VIEWPORT_SHADING_RATE_DESC_V1;
15473
15474typedef struct _NV_D3D11_VIEWPORTS_SHADING_RATE_DESC_V1
15475{
15476 NvU32 version;
15477 NvU32 numViewports;
15478 // \note Passing zero will globally disable Variable Pixel Rate Shading for all viewports immaterial of values in pViewports
15479 // \note Max value can be equal to NV_MAX_NUM_VIEWPORTS
15480 NV_D3D11_VIEWPORT_SHADING_RATE_DESC_V1 *pViewports;
15481} NV_D3D11_VIEWPORTS_SHADING_RATE_DESC_V1;
15482
15483typedef NV_D3D11_VIEWPORTS_SHADING_RATE_DESC_V1 NV_D3D11_VIEWPORTS_SHADING_RATE_DESC;
15484typedef NV_D3D11_VIEWPORT_SHADING_RATE_DESC_V1 NV_D3D11_VIEWPORT_SHADING_RATE_DESC;
15485#define NV_D3D11_VIEWPORTS_SHADING_RATE_DESC_VER1 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(NV_D3D11_VIEWPORTS_SHADING_RATE_DESC_V1, 1)
15486#define NV_D3D11_VIEWPORTS_SHADING_RATE_DESC_VER NV_D3D11_VIEWPORTS_SHADING_RATE_DESC_VER1
15487

15490// FUNCTION NAME: NvAPI_D3D11_RSSetViewportsPixelShadingRates
15491//

15510NVAPI_INTERFACE NvAPI_D3D11_RSSetViewportsPixelShadingRates(__in IUnknown *pContext,
15511 __in NV_D3D11_VIEWPORTS_SHADING_RATE_DESC *pShadingRateDesc);

15513#endif // defined(__cplusplus) && (defined(__d3d11_h__))
15514
15515#if defined(__cplusplus) && (defined(__d3d11_h__) || defined(__d3d12_h__))
15516
15517typedef enum _NV_SRRV_DIMENSION
15518{
15519 NV_SRRV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2D = 4,
15520 NV_SRRV_DIMENSION_TEXTURE2DARRAY = 5,
15521} NV_SRRV_DIMENSION;
15522
15523typedef struct _NV_TEX2D_SRRV
15524{
15525 UINT MipSlice;
15526} NV_TEX2D_SRRV;
15527
15528typedef struct _NV_TEX2D_ARRAY_SRRV
15529{
15530 UINT MipSlice;
15531 UINT FirstArraySlice;
15532 UINT ArraySize;
15533} NV_TEX2D_ARRAY_SRRV;
15534#endif // defined(__cplusplus) && (defined(__d3d11_h__) || defined(__d3d12_h__))
15535
15536#if defined(__cplusplus) && (defined(__d3d11_h__))
15537typedef struct _NV_D3D11_SHADING_RATE_RESOURCE_VIEW_DESC_V1
15538{
15539 NvU32 version;
15540 DXGI_FORMAT Format;
15541 NV_SRRV_DIMENSION ViewDimension;
15542 union
15543 {
15544 NV_TEX2D_SRRV Texture2D;
15545 NV_TEX2D_ARRAY_SRRV Texture2DArray;
15546 };
15547} NV_D3D11_SHADING_RATE_RESOURCE_VIEW_DESC_V1;
15548
15549typedef NV_D3D11_SHADING_RATE_RESOURCE_VIEW_DESC_V1 NV_D3D11_SHADING_RATE_RESOURCE_VIEW_DESC;
15550#define NV_D3D11_SHADING_RATE_RESOURCE_VIEW_DESC_VER1 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(NV_D3D11_SHADING_RATE_RESOURCE_VIEW_DESC_V1, 1)
15551#define NV_D3D11_SHADING_RATE_RESOURCE_VIEW_DESC_VER NV_D3D11_SHADING_RATE_RESOURCE_VIEW_DESC_VER1
15552
15553DECLARE_INTERFACE_(__declspec(uuid("E14BE7F6-8FF5-4F5E-B63A-AD016EB8FBE5"))ID3D11NvShadingRateResourceView_V1, ID3D11View)
15554{
15555 BEGIN_INTERFACE
15556
15557 // *** IUnknown methods ***
15558 STDMETHOD(QueryInterface)(THIS_ REFIID riid, void **ppv) PURE;
15559 STDMETHOD_(ULONG,AddRef)(THIS) PURE;
15560 STDMETHOD_(ULONG,Release)(THIS) PURE;
15561
15562 // **** ID3D11View method **/
15563 // Get Shading Rate Resource used while creating the Shading Rate Resource View
15564 STDMETHOD_(void,GetResource)(THIS_ _Outptr_ ID3D11Resource **ppResource) PURE;
15565
15566 // ** ID3D11NvShadingRateResourceView methods ***
15567 // The descriptor used while creating the Shading Rate Resource View
15568 STDMETHOD(GetDesc)(THIS_ NV_D3D11_SHADING_RATE_RESOURCE_VIEW_DESC* pDesc) PURE;
15569
15570 END_INTERFACE
15571};
15572
15573typedef ID3D11NvShadingRateResourceView_V1 ID3D11NvShadingRateResourceView;
15574#define ID3D11NvShadingRateResourceView_VER1 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(ID3D11NvShadingRateResourceView_V1, 1)
15575#define ID3D11NvShadingRateResourceView_VER ID3D11NvShadingRateResourceView_VER1
15576
15578//
15579// FUNCTION NAME: NvAPI_D3D11_CreateShadingRateResourceView
15580//
15603
15604NVAPI_INTERFACE NvAPI_D3D11_CreateShadingRateResourceView(__in ID3D11Device *pDevice,
15605 __in ID3D11Resource *pShadingRateResource,
15606 __in NV_D3D11_SHADING_RATE_RESOURCE_VIEW_DESC *pShadingRateResourceViewDesc,
15607 __out ID3D11NvShadingRateResourceView **ppShadingRateResourceView);
15608
15609#endif // defined(__cplusplus) && (defined(__d3d11_h__))

15614//
15615// FUNCTION NAME: NvAPI_D3D11_RSSetShadingRateResourceView
15616//

15638 __in ID3D11NvShadingRateResourceView *pShadingRateResourceView);

15641
15642#if defined(__cplusplus) && (defined(__d3d11_h__) || defined(__d3d12_h__))
15646
15647// X, Y = sample position. S = sample number.
15648// The inner-most dimension is the sample number, followed by X and Y.
15649
15650typedef struct _NV_PIXEL_SRSO_1x2
15651{
15652 struct NV_PIXEL_SRSO_1x2_X1 { NvU8 Y[2]; } X1;
15653 struct NV_PIXEL_SRSO_1x2_X2 { NvU8 YS[2][2]; } X2;
15654 struct NV_PIXEL_SRSO_1x2_X4 { NvU8 YS[2][4]; } X4;
15655 struct NV_PIXEL_SRSO_1x2_X8 { NvU8 YS[2][8]; } X8;
15656} NV_PIXEL_SRSO_1x2;
15657
15658typedef struct _NV_PIXEL_SRSO_2x1
15659{
15660 struct NV_PIXEL_SRSO_2x1_X1 { NvU8 X[2]; } X1;
15661 struct NV_PIXEL_SRSO_2x1_X2 { NvU8 XS[2][2]; } X2;
15662 struct NV_PIXEL_SRSO_2x1_X4 { NvU8 XS[2][4]; } X4;
15663} NV_PIXEL_SRSO_2x1;
15664
15665typedef struct _NV_PIXEL_SRSO_2x2
15666{
15667 struct NV_PIXEL_SRSO_2x2_X1 { NvU8 YX[2][2]; } X1;
15668 struct NV_PIXEL_SRSO_2x2_X2 { NvU8 YXS[2][2][2]; } X2;
15669 struct NV_PIXEL_SRSO_2x2_X4 { NvU8 YXS[2][2][4]; } X4;
15670} NV_PIXEL_SRSO_2x2;
15671
15672typedef struct _NV_PIXEL_SRSO_2x4
15673{
15674 struct NV_PIXEL_SRSO_2x4_X1 { NvU8 YX[4][2]; } X1;
15675 struct NV_PIXEL_SRSO_2x4_X2 { NvU8 YXS[4][2][2]; } X2;
15676} NV_PIXEL_SRSO_2x4;
15677
15678typedef struct _NV_PIXEL_SRSO_4x2
15679{
15680 struct NV_PIXEL_SRSO_4x2_X1 { NvU8 YX[2][4]; } X1;
15681} NV_PIXEL_SRSO_4x2;
15682
15683typedef struct _NV_PIXEL_SRSO_4x4
15684{
15685 struct NV_PIXEL_SRSO_4x4_X1 { NvU8 YX[4][4]; } X1;
15686} NV_PIXEL_SRSO_4x4;
15687
15688typedef struct _NV_PIXEL_SHADING_RATE_SAMPLE_ORDER_TABLE_V1
15689{
15690 NvU32 version;
15691 NV_PIXEL_SRSO_1x2 Pixel_1x2;
15692 NV_PIXEL_SRSO_2x1 Pixel_2x1;
15693 NV_PIXEL_SRSO_2x2 Pixel_2x2;
15694 NV_PIXEL_SRSO_2x4 Pixel_2x4;
15695 NV_PIXEL_SRSO_4x2 Pixel_4x2;
15696 NV_PIXEL_SRSO_4x4 Pixel_4x4;
15697} NV_PIXEL_SHADING_RATE_SAMPLE_ORDER_TABLE_V1;
15698
15699typedef NV_PIXEL_SHADING_RATE_SAMPLE_ORDER_TABLE_V1 NV_PIXEL_SHADING_RATE_SAMPLE_ORDER_TABLE;
15700#define NV_PIXEL_SHADING_RATE_SAMPLE_ORDER_TABLE_VER1 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(NV_PIXEL_SHADING_RATE_SAMPLE_ORDER_TABLE_V1, 1)
15701#define NV_PIXEL_SHADING_RATE_SAMPLE_ORDER_TABLE_VER NV_PIXEL_SHADING_RATE_SAMPLE_ORDER_TABLE_VER1
15702
15703#endif // defined(__cplusplus) && (defined(__d3d11_h__) || defined(__d3d12_h__))
15704
15705#if defined(__cplusplus) && (defined(__d3d11_h__))

15851typedef enum _NV_VRS_RENDER_MODE
15852{
15853 NV_VRS_RENDER_MODE_INVALID = 0,
15854 NV_VRS_RENDER_MODE_MONO = 1, // States mono rendering on the entire render target
15855 NV_VRS_RENDER_MODE_LEFT_EYE = 2, // States Left eye rendering of a stereo pair on the entire render target
15856 NV_VRS_RENDER_MODE_RIGHT_EYE = 3, // States Right eye rendering of a stereo pair on the entire render target
15857 NV_VRS_RENDER_MODE_STEREO = 4, // States side-by-side stereo rendering on the render target
15858 NV_VRS_RENDER_MODE_MAX = NV_VRS_RENDER_MODE_STEREO
15859} NV_VRS_RENDER_MODE;
15860
15861#define MAX_NUMBER_OF_GAZE_DATA_PROVIDERS 8 // Maximum number of gaze data providers / devices.

15899typedef struct _NV_VRS_HELPER_PURGE_INTERNAL_RESOURCES_PARAMS_V1
15900{
15901 NvU32 version;
15902 NvU32 reserved;
15903} NV_VRS_HELPER_PURGE_INTERNAL_RESOURCES_PARAMS_V1;
15904
15905typedef NV_VRS_HELPER_PURGE_INTERNAL_RESOURCES_PARAMS_V1 NV_VRS_HELPER_PURGE_INTERNAL_RESOURCES_PARAMS;
15906#define NV_VRS_HELPER_PURGE_INTERNAL_RESOURCES_PARAMS_VER1 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(NV_VRS_HELPER_PURGE_INTERNAL_RESOURCES_PARAMS_V1, 1)
15907#define NV_VRS_HELPER_PURGE_INTERNAL_RESOURCES_PARAMS_VER NV_VRS_HELPER_PURGE_INTERNAL_RESOURCES_PARAMS_VER1
15908
15909DECLARE_INTERFACE(ID3DNvVRSHelper_V1)
15910{
15911 BEGIN_INTERFACE
15912
15913 STDMETHOD_(ULONG,AddRef)(THIS) PURE;
15914 STDMETHOD_(ULONG,Release)(THIS) PURE;
15915
15916 // Latches the latest gaze which will be used for subsequent foveated rendering. Recommended to be called once per frame before scene drawing begins.
15917 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,LatchGaze)(THIS_ IUnknown* pContext, NV_VRS_HELPER_LATCH_GAZE_PARAMS* pLatchGazeParams) PURE;
15918
15919 // Enables VRS with sepcified content type and preset. This can be called per draw call.
15920 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,Enable)(THIS_ IUnknown* pContext, NV_VRS_HELPER_ENABLE_PARAMS* pEnableParams) PURE;
15921
15922 // Disables VRS till re-enabled.
15923 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,Disable)(THIS_ IUnknown* pContext, NV_VRS_HELPER_DISABLE_PARAMS* pDisableParams) PURE;
15924
15925 // Creates a 2D texture, copies the current shading rate pattern on it and returns the pointer to this texture.
15926 // It also returns an array that conveys which value in the shading rate resource corresponds to which exact pixel shading rate.
15927 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,GetShadingRateResource)(THIS_ IUnknown* pContext, NV_VRS_HELPER_GET_SHADING_RATE_RESOURCE_PARAMS *pGetShadingRateResourceParams) PURE;
15928
15929 // Destroys all internally created shading rate resources and views.
15930 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,PurgeInternalShadingRateResources)(THIS_ IUnknown* pContext, NV_VRS_HELPER_PURGE_INTERNAL_RESOURCES_PARAMS* pPurgeParams) PURE;
15931
15932 END_INTERFACE
15933};
15934
15935typedef ID3DNvVRSHelper_V1 ID3DNvVRSHelper;
15936#define ID3DNvVRSHelper_VER1 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(ID3DNvVRSHelper_V1, 1)
15937#define ID3DNvVRSHelper_VER ID3DNvVRSHelper_VER1
15938
15939typedef struct _NV_VRS_HELPER_INIT_PARAMS_V1
15940{
15941 NvU32 version;
15942 NvU32 flags;
15943
15944 ID3DNvVRSHelper_V1 **ppVRSHelper;
15945} NV_VRS_HELPER_INIT_PARAMS_V1;
15946
15947typedef NV_VRS_HELPER_INIT_PARAMS_V1 NV_VRS_HELPER_INIT_PARAMS;
15948#define NV_VRS_HELPER_INIT_PARAMS_VER1 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(NV_VRS_HELPER_INIT_PARAMS_V1, 1)
15949#define NV_VRS_HELPER_INIT_PARAMS_VER NV_VRS_HELPER_INIT_PARAMS_VER1

16019 {
16020 NV_FOVEATED_RENDERING_GAZE_DATA_PER_EYE_V1 sLeftEye;

16041
16042 END_INTERFACE
16043};

16059};

16151
16153
16154typedef enum NV_SMP_ASSIST_TYPE
16155{
16156 NV_SMP_ASSIST_NONE = 0,
16157 NV_SMP_ASSIST_MRS = 1, // SMP Assist required for Multi-Res Shading
16158 NV_SMP_ASSIST_LMS = 2, // SMP Assist required for Lens Matched Shading
16159 NV_SMP_ASSIST_NUM_TYPES
16160} NV_SMP_ASSIST_TYPE;
16161
16162typedef enum NV_SMP_ASSIST_LEVEL
16163{
16164 NV_SMP_ASSIST_LEVEL_FULL = 0, // Full assistance. App selects a pre-baked MRS/LMS config, driver handles correct setting of viewport, scissors and FastGS
16165 NV_SMP_ASSIST_LEVEL_PARTIAL = 1, // Partial assistance. App provides a custom MRS/LMS config, driver handles correct setting of viewport, scissors and FastGS
16166 NV_SMP_ASSIST_LEVEL_MINIMAL = 2, // Minimal assistance. App provides viewports and scissors. App sets FastGS as required. App sets LMS params as required (NvAPI_D3D_SetModifiedWMode). App provides SMPType as NONE. Driver handles correct setting of viewports and scissors.
16167 NV_SMP_ASSIST_NUM_LEVELS
16168} NV_SMP_ASSIST_LEVEL;
16169
16170typedef enum NV_MRS_CONFIG
16171{
16172 NV_MRS_CONFIG_BALANCED = 0,
16173 NV_MRS_CONFIG_AGGRESSIVE = 1,
16174 NV_MRS_CONFIG_OCULUSRIFT_CV1_CONSERVATIVE = 2,
16175 NV_MRS_CONFIG_OCULUSRIFT_CV1_BALANCED = 3,
16176 NV_MRS_CONFIG_OCULUSRIFT_CV1_AGGRESSIVE = 4,
16177 NV_MRS_CONFIG_HTC_VIVE_CONSERVATIVE = 5,
16178 NV_MRS_CONFIG_HTC_VIVE_BALANCED = 6,
16179 NV_MRS_CONFIG_HTC_VIVE_AGGRESSIVE = 7,
16180 NV_MRS_NUM_CONFIGS
16181} NV_MRS_CONFIG;
16182

16184{
16185 NV_LMS_CONFIG_OCULUSRIFT_CV1_CONSERVATIVE = 0,
16186 NV_LMS_CONFIG_OCULUSRIFT_CV1_BALANCED = 1,
16187 NV_LMS_CONFIG_OCULUSRIFT_CV1_AGGRESSIVE = 2,
16188 NV_LMS_CONFIG_HTC_VIVE_CONSERVATIVE = 3,
16189 NV_LMS_CONFIG_HTC_VIVE_BALANCED = 4,
16190 NV_LMS_CONFIG_HTC_VIVE_AGGRESSIVE = 5,
16191 NV_LMS_NUM_CONFIGS
16192} NV_LMS_CONFIG;

16210typedef struct _NV_MRS_INSTANCED_STEREO_CONFIG_V1
16211{
16212 float centerWidth[2];
16213 float centerHeight;
16214 float centerX[2];
16215 float centerY;
16216 float densityScaleX[5];
16217 float densityScaleY[3];
16218} NV_MRS_INSTANCED_STEREO_CONFIG_V1;
16219
16220typedef NV_MRS_INSTANCED_STEREO_CONFIG_V1 NV_MRS_INSTANCED_STEREO_CONFIG;
16221

16223{

16225 float warpRight;
16226 float warpUp;
16227 float warpDown;
16228
16229 float relativeSizeLeft;
16230 float relativeSizeRight;
16231 float relativeSizeUp;
16232 float relativeSizeDown;
16233} NV_LMS_CUSTOM_CONFIG_V1;
16234
16235typedef NV_LMS_CUSTOM_CONFIG_V1 NV_LMS_CUSTOM_CONFIG;
16236
16237typedef struct _NV_LMS_INSTANCED_STEREO_CONFIG_V1

16241} NV_LMS_INSTANCED_STEREO_CONFIG_V1;
16242

16244
16245typedef enum _NV_SMP_ASSIST_EYE_INDEX
16246{
16247 NV_SMP_ASSIST_EYE_INDEX_MONO = 0, // Non-stereo rendering
16248 NV_SMP_ASSIST_EYE_INDEX_LEFT_EYE = 1, // Stereo - Rendering left eye
16249 NV_SMP_ASSIST_EYE_INDEX_RIGHT_EYE = 2, // Stereo - Rendering right eye
16250 NV_SMP_ASSIST_EYE_INDEX_INSTANCED_STEREO = 3, // Stereo - Rendering both eyes
16251} NV_SMP_ASSIST_EYE_INDEX;
16252

16254

16302// Constant buffer data to supply the UV-remapping helper functions
16303// Refer VRWorks SDK's multiprojection_dx app (struct RemapCBData)
16304typedef struct _NV_SMP_ASSIST_REMAPCBDATA_V1
16305{
16307 float ClipToWindowSplitsX[2];
16308 float ClipToWindowSplitsY[2];
16309 float ClipToWindowX[3][2]; // ClipToWindowX[i][0] is Scale and ClipToWindowX[i][1] is Bias
16310 float ClipToWindowY[3][2]; // ClipToWindowY[i][0] is Scale and ClipToWindowY[i][1] is Bias
16311 float ClipToWindowZ[2]; // ClipToWindowZ[0] is Scale and ClipToWindowZ[1] is Bias
16312
16313 float WindowToClipSplitsX[2];
16314 float WindowToClipSplitsY[2];
16315 float WindowToClipX[3][2]; // WindowToClipX[i][0] is Scale and WindowToClipX[i][1] is Bias
16316 float WindowToClipY[3][2]; // WindowToClipY[i][0] is Scale and WindowToClipY[i][1] is Bias
16317 float WindowToClipZ[2]; // WindowToClipZ[0] is Scale and WindowToClipZ[1] is Bias
16318
16319 float BoundingRectOriginX;
16320 float BoundingRectOriginY;
16321 float BoundingRectSizeWidth;
16322 float BoundingRectSizeHeight;
16323 float BoundingRectSizeInvWidth;
16324 float BoundingRectSizeInvHeight;
16325
16326 float Padding[2];
16327}NV_SMP_ASSIST_REMAPCBDATA_V1;
16328
16329typedef NV_SMP_ASSIST_REMAPCBDATA_V1 NV_SMP_ASSIST_REMAPCBDATA;

16397
16398typedef struct _NV_SMP_ASSIST_UPDATE_INSTANCEDSTEREO_DATA_PARAMS_V1
16399{
16400 NvU32 version;
16401 NV_SMP_ASSIST_TYPE eSMPAssistType; // Patch instanced stereo shaders (created with packed eye index) with this SMPAssistType (NV_SMP_ASSIST_LMS only)
16402 float leftCoeffs[4]; // Left eye: outpos.x = dotproduct(outputpos, leftCoeffs) + leftConst
16403 float leftConst;
16404 float rightCoeffs[4]; // Right eye: outpos.x = dotproduct(outputpos, rightCoeffs) + rightConst
16405 float rightConst;
16406} NV_SMP_ASSIST_UPDATE_INSTANCEDSTEREO_DATA_PARAMS_V1;
16407
16408typedef NV_SMP_ASSIST_UPDATE_INSTANCEDSTEREO_DATA_PARAMS_V1 NV_SMP_ASSIST_UPDATE_INSTANCEDSTEREO_DATA_PARAMS;
16409#define NV_SMP_ASSIST_UPDATE_INSTANCEDSTEREO_DATA_PARAMS_VER1 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(NV_SMP_ASSIST_UPDATE_INSTANCEDSTEREO_DATA_PARAMS_V1, 1)
16410#define NV_SMP_ASSIST_UPDATE_INSTANCEDSTEREO_DATA_PARAMS_VER NV_SMP_ASSIST_UPDATE_INSTANCEDSTEREO_DATA_PARAMS_VER1
16411
16414
16415DECLARE_INTERFACE(ID3DNvSMPAssist_V1)
16416{
16418 // Disable SMP Assist for further Draw calls
16419 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,Disable)(THIS_ __in IUnknown *pDevContext, __in const NV_SMP_ASSIST_DISABLE_PARAMS *psSMPAssistDisableParams) PURE;
16420
16421 // Enable SMP Assist for further Draw calls. App has to provide the type of rendering done in upcoming Draw calls - Mono/Left eye/Right eye/Instanced Stereo
16422 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,Enable)(THIS_ __in IUnknown *pDevContext, __in const NV_SMP_ASSIST_ENABLE_PARAMS *psSMPAssistEnableParams) PURE;
16423
16424 // Get the constants used by the drivers
16425 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,GetConstants)(THIS_ __inout NV_SMP_ASSIST_GET_CONSTANTS *psSMPAssistGetConstants) PURE;
16426
16427 // Setup the projections (rects, constant buffer data etc.)
16428 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,SetupProjections)(THIS_ __in IUnknown *pDevice, __in const NV_SMP_ASSIST_SETUP_PARAMS *psSMPAssistSetupParams) PURE;
16429
16430 // Update instanced stereo specific data
16431 STDMETHOD_(NvAPI_Status,UpdateInstancedStereoData)(THIS_ __in IUnknown *pDevice, __in const NV_SMP_ASSIST_UPDATE_INSTANCEDSTEREO_DATA_PARAMS *psSMPAssistInstancedStereoParams) PURE;
16433};
16434
16435typedef ID3DNvSMPAssist_V1 ID3DNvSMPAssist;
16436#define ID3DNVSMPASSIST_VER1 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(ID3DNvSMPAssist_V1, 1)
16437#define ID3DNVSMPASSIST_VER ID3DNVSMPASSIST_VER1
16438

16655typedef struct _NV_LATENCY_RESULT_PARAMS
16656{
16657 NvU32 version;
16658 struct FrameReport {
16659 NvU64 frameID;
16660 NvU64 inputSampleTime;
16661 NvU64 simStartTime;
16662 NvU64 simEndTime;
16663 NvU64 renderSubmitStartTime;
16664 NvU64 renderSubmitEndTime;
16665 NvU64 presentStartTime;
16666 NvU64 presentEndTime;
16667 NvU64 driverStartTime;
16668 NvU64 driverEndTime;
16669 NvU64 osRenderQueueStartTime;
16670 NvU64 osRenderQueueEndTime;
16671 NvU64 gpuRenderStartTime;
16672 NvU64 gpuRenderEndTime;
16673 NvU32 gpuActiveRenderTimeUs;
16674 NvU32 gpuFrameTimeUs;
16675 NvU8 rsvd[120];
16676 } frameReport[64];
16677 NvU8 rsvd[32];
16678} NV_LATENCY_RESULT_PARAMS_V1;
16679
16680typedef NV_LATENCY_RESULT_PARAMS_V1 NV_LATENCY_RESULT_PARAMS;

16682#define NV_LATENCY_RESULT_PARAMS_VER NV_LATENCY_RESULT_PARAMS_VER1

16864NVAPI_INTERFACE NvAPI_D3D11_CreateCubinComputeShader(__in ID3D11Device* pDevice,
16865 __in const void* pCubin,
16866 __in NvU32 size,
16867 __in NvU32 blockX,
16868 __in NvU32 blockY,
16869 __in NvU32 blockZ,
16870 __out NVDX_ObjectHandle* phShader);
16871
16872// Experimental API for internal use. DO NOT USE!
16875NVAPI_INTERFACE NvAPI_D3D11_CreateCubinComputeShaderEx(__in ID3D11Device* pDevice,
16876 __in const void* pCubin,
16877 __in NvU32 size,
16878 __in NvU32 blockX,
16879 __in NvU32 blockY,
16880 __in NvU32 blockZ,
16881 __in NvU32 dynSharedMemBytes,
16882 __in const char* pShaderName,
16883 __out NVDX_ObjectHandle* phShader);
16884
16885// Experimental API for internal use. DO NOT USE!
16888NVAPI_INTERFACE NvAPI_D3D11_CreateCubinComputeShaderWithName(__in ID3D11Device* pDevice,
16889 __in const void* pCubin,
16890 __in NvU32 size,
16891 __in NvU32 blockX,
16892 __in NvU32 blockY,
16893 __in NvU32 blockZ,
16894 __in const char* pShaderName,
16895 __out NVDX_ObjectHandle* phShader);
16896
16897
16898// Experimental API for internal use. DO NOT USE!
16901NVAPI_INTERFACE NvAPI_D3D11_LaunchCubinShader(__in ID3D11DeviceContext *pDeviceContext,
16902 __in NVDX_ObjectHandle hShader,
16903 __in NvU32 gridX,
16904 __in NvU32 gridY,
16905 __in NvU32 gridZ,
16906 __in const void* pParams,
16907 __in NvU32 paramSize,
16908 __in const NVDX_ObjectHandle* pReadResources,
16909 __in NvU32 numReadResources,
16910 __in const NVDX_ObjectHandle* pWriteResources,
16911 __in NvU32 numWriteResources);
16912
16913// Experimental API for internal use. DO NOT USE!
16916NVAPI_INTERFACE NvAPI_D3D11_DestroyCubinComputeShader(__in ID3D11Device* pDevice,
16917 __in NVDX_ObjectHandle hShader);
16918

16922NVAPI_INTERFACE NvAPI_D3D11_IsFatbinPTXSupported(__in ID3D11Device *pDevice,
16923 __out bool *pSupported);
16924

16972typedef NvU32 NVVIOOWNERID;
16973
16974
16977
16978
16979#define NVVIOOWNERID_NONE 0
16980
16981
16983typedef enum _NVVIOOWNERTYPE
16984{
16985 NVVIOOWNERTYPE_NONE ,
16986 NVVIOOWNERTYPE_APPLICATION ,
16987 NVVIOOWNERTYPE_DESKTOP ,
16988}NVVIOOWNERTYPE;
16989
16990// Access rights for NvAPI_VIO_Open()
16991
16993#define NVVIO_O_READ 0x00000000
16994
16996#define NVVIO_O_WRITE_EXCLUSIVE 0x00010001
16997
16999#define NVVIO_VALID_ACCESSRIGHTS (NVVIO_O_READ | \
17000 NVVIO_O_WRITE_EXCLUSIVE )
17001
17002
17005#define NVVIO_OWNERID_INITIALIZED 0x80000000
17006
17008#define NVVIO_OWNERID_EXCLUSIVE 0x40000000
17009
17012#define NVVIO_OWNERID_TYPEMASK 0x0FFFFFFF

17322#define NVVIOCAPS_VIDOUT_SDI 0x00000001

17325#define NVVIOCAPS_SYNC_INTERNAL 0x00000100
17326
17328#define NVVIOCAPS_SYNC_GENLOCK 0x00000200
17329

17332

17338
17340#define NVVIOCAPS_OUTPUTMODE_OPENGL 0x00020000
17341

17344

17352#define NVVIOCLASS_SDI 0x00000001
17353
17355typedef struct _NVVIOCAPS
17356{
17357 NvU32 version;
17358 NvAPI_String adapterName;
17359 NvU32 adapterClass;
17360 NvU32 adapterCaps;
17361 NvU32 dipSwitch;
17362 NvU32 dipSwitchReserved;
17363 NvU32 boardID;
17365 struct //
17366 {
17367 NvU32 majorVersion;
17368 NvU32 minorVersion;
17369 } driver; //
17371 struct
17372 {
17373 NvU32 majorVersion;
17374 NvU32 minorVersion;
17375 } firmWare; //
17376 NVVIOOWNERID ownerId;
17377 NVVIOOWNERTYPE ownerType;
17378} NVVIOCAPS;
17379
17381#define NVVIOCAPS_VER1 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(NVVIOCAPS,1)
17382#define NVVIOCAPS_VER2 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(NVVIOCAPS,2)
17383#define NVVIOCAPS_VER NVVIOCAPS_VER2
17384

17387{

17400 NVVIOCAPTURESTATUS captureStatus;

17405{

17544
17546typedef struct _NVVIOGAMMACORRECTION
17547{
17548 NvU32 version;
17549 NvU32 vioGammaCorrectionType;
17551 union
17552 {
17553 NVVIOGAMMARAMP8 gammaRamp8;
17554 NVVIOGAMMARAMP10 gammaRamp10;
17555 }gammaRamp;
17556 float fGammaValueR;
17557 float fGammaValueG;
17558 float fGammaValueB;
17559} NVVIOGAMMACORRECTION;
17560
17562#define NVVIOGAMMACORRECTION_VER MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(NVVIOGAMMACORRECTION,1)
17563
17565#define MAX_NUM_COMPOSITE_RANGE 2
17566
17567
17568typedef struct _NVVIOCOMPOSITERANGE
17569{
17570 NvU32 uRange;
17571 NvU32 uEnabled;
17572 NvU32 uMin;
17573 NvU32 uMax;
17574} NVVIOCOMPOSITERANGE;
17575
17576
17577
17578// Device configuration (fields masks indicating NVVIOCONFIG fields to use for NvAPI_VIO_GetConfig/NvAPI_VIO_SetConfig() )
17579//
17580#define NVVIOCONFIG_SIGNALFORMAT 0x00000001
17581#define NVVIOCONFIG_DATAFORMAT 0x00000002
17582#define NVVIOCONFIG_OUTPUTREGION 0x00000004
17583#define NVVIOCONFIG_OUTPUTAREA 0x00000008
17584#define NVVIOCONFIG_COLORCONVERSION 0x00000010
17585#define NVVIOCONFIG_GAMMACORRECTION 0x00000020
17586#define NVVIOCONFIG_SYNCSOURCEENABLE 0x00000040
17587#define NVVIOCONFIG_SYNCDELAY 0x00000080
17588#define NVVIOCONFIG_COMPOSITESYNCTYPE 0x00000100
17589#define NVVIOCONFIG_FRAMELOCKENABLE 0x00000200
17590#define NVVIOCONFIG_422FILTER 0x00000400
17591#define NVVIOCONFIG_COMPOSITETERMINATE 0x00000800
17592#define NVVIOCONFIG_DATAINTEGRITYCHECK 0x00001000
17593#define NVVIOCONFIG_CSCOVERRIDE 0x00002000
17594#define NVVIOCONFIG_FLIPQUEUELENGTH 0x00004000
17595#define NVVIOCONFIG_ANCTIMECODEGENERATION 0x00008000
17596#define NVVIOCONFIG_COMPOSITE 0x00010000
17597#define NVVIOCONFIG_ALPHAKEYCOMPOSITE 0x00020000
17598#define NVVIOCONFIG_COMPOSITE_Y 0x00040000
17599#define NVVIOCONFIG_COMPOSITE_CR 0x00080000
17600#define NVVIOCONFIG_COMPOSITE_CB 0x00100000
17601#define NVVIOCONFIG_FULL_COLOR_RANGE 0x00200000
17602#define NVVIOCONFIG_RGB_DATA 0x00400000
17603#define NVVIOCONFIG_RESERVED_SDIOUTPUTENABLE 0x00800000
17604#define NVVIOCONFIG_STREAMS 0x01000000
17605#define NVVIOCONFIG_ANC_PARITY_COMPUTATION 0x02000000
17606#define NVVIOCONFIG_ANC_AUDIO_REPEAT 0x04000000
17607
17608
17609// Don't forget to update NVVIOCONFIG_VALIDFIELDS in nvapi.spec when NVVIOCONFIG_ALLFIELDS changes.
17610#define NVVIOCONFIG_ALLFIELDS ( NVVIOCONFIG_SIGNALFORMAT | \
17611 NVVIOCONFIG_DATAFORMAT | \
17612 NVVIOCONFIG_OUTPUTREGION | \
17613 NVVIOCONFIG_OUTPUTAREA | \
17614 NVVIOCONFIG_COLORCONVERSION | \
17615 NVVIOCONFIG_GAMMACORRECTION | \
17616 NVVIOCONFIG_SYNCSOURCEENABLE | \
17617 NVVIOCONFIG_SYNCDELAY | \
17618 NVVIOCONFIG_COMPOSITESYNCTYPE | \
17619 NVVIOCONFIG_FRAMELOCKENABLE | \
17620 NVVIOCONFIG_422FILTER | \
17621 NVVIOCONFIG_COMPOSITETERMINATE | \
17622 NVVIOCONFIG_DATAINTEGRITYCHECK | \
17623 NVVIOCONFIG_CSCOVERRIDE | \
17624 NVVIOCONFIG_FLIPQUEUELENGTH | \
17625 NVVIOCONFIG_ANCTIMECODEGENERATION | \
17626 NVVIOCONFIG_COMPOSITE | \
17627 NVVIOCONFIG_ALPHAKEYCOMPOSITE | \
17628 NVVIOCONFIG_COMPOSITE_Y | \
17629 NVVIOCONFIG_COMPOSITE_CR | \
17630 NVVIOCONFIG_COMPOSITE_CB | \
17631 NVVIOCONFIG_FULL_COLOR_RANGE | \
17632 NVVIOCONFIG_RGB_DATA | \
17633 NVVIOCONFIG_RESERVED_SDIOUTPUTENABLE | \
17634 NVVIOCONFIG_STREAMS | \
17635 NVVIOCONFIG_ANC_PARITY_COMPUTATION | \
17636 NVVIOCONFIG_ANC_AUDIO_REPEAT )
17637
17638#define NVVIOCONFIG_VALIDFIELDS ( NVVIOCONFIG_SIGNALFORMAT | \
17639 NVVIOCONFIG_DATAFORMAT | \
17640 NVVIOCONFIG_OUTPUTREGION | \
17641 NVVIOCONFIG_OUTPUTAREA | \
17642 NVVIOCONFIG_COLORCONVERSION | \
17643 NVVIOCONFIG_GAMMACORRECTION | \
17644 NVVIOCONFIG_SYNCSOURCEENABLE | \
17645 NVVIOCONFIG_SYNCDELAY | \
17646 NVVIOCONFIG_COMPOSITESYNCTYPE | \
17647 NVVIOCONFIG_FRAMELOCKENABLE | \
17648 NVVIOCONFIG_RESERVED_SDIOUTPUTENABLE | \
17649 NVVIOCONFIG_422FILTER | \
17650 NVVIOCONFIG_COMPOSITETERMINATE | \
17651 NVVIOCONFIG_DATAINTEGRITYCHECK | \
17652 NVVIOCONFIG_CSCOVERRIDE | \
17653 NVVIOCONFIG_FLIPQUEUELENGTH | \
17654 NVVIOCONFIG_ANCTIMECODEGENERATION | \
17655 NVVIOCONFIG_COMPOSITE | \
17656 NVVIOCONFIG_ALPHAKEYCOMPOSITE | \
17657 NVVIOCONFIG_COMPOSITE_Y | \
17658 NVVIOCONFIG_COMPOSITE_CR | \
17659 NVVIOCONFIG_COMPOSITE_CB | \
17660 NVVIOCONFIG_FULL_COLOR_RANGE | \
17661 NVVIOCONFIG_RGB_DATA | \
17662 NVVIOCONFIG_RESERVED_SDIOUTPUTENABLE | \
17663 NVVIOCONFIG_STREAMS | \
17664 NVVIOCONFIG_ANC_PARITY_COMPUTATION | \
17665 NVVIOCONFIG_ANC_AUDIO_REPEAT)
17666
17667#define NVVIOCONFIG_DRIVERFIELDS ( NVVIOCONFIG_OUTPUTREGION | \
17668 NVVIOCONFIG_OUTPUTAREA | \
17669 NVVIOCONFIG_COLORCONVERSION | \
17670 NVVIOCONFIG_FLIPQUEUELENGTH)
17671
17672#define NVVIOCONFIG_GAMMAFIELDS ( NVVIOCONFIG_GAMMACORRECTION )
17673
17674#define NVVIOCONFIG_RMCTRLFIELDS ( NVVIOCONFIG_SIGNALFORMAT | \
17675 NVVIOCONFIG_DATAFORMAT | \
17676 NVVIOCONFIG_SYNCSOURCEENABLE | \
17677 NVVIOCONFIG_COMPOSITESYNCTYPE | \
17678 NVVIOCONFIG_FRAMELOCKENABLE | \
17679 NVVIOCONFIG_422FILTER | \
17680 NVVIOCONFIG_COMPOSITETERMINATE | \
17681 NVVIOCONFIG_DATAINTEGRITYCHECK | \
17682 NVVIOCONFIG_COMPOSITE | \
17683 NVVIOCONFIG_ALPHAKEYCOMPOSITE | \
17684 NVVIOCONFIG_COMPOSITE_Y | \
17685 NVVIOCONFIG_COMPOSITE_CR | \
17686 NVVIOCONFIG_COMPOSITE_CB)
17687
17688#define NVVIOCONFIG_RMSKEWFIELDS ( NVVIOCONFIG_SYNCDELAY )
17689
17690#define NVVIOCONFIG_ALLOWSDIRUNNING_FIELDS ( NVVIOCONFIG_DATAINTEGRITYCHECK | \
17691 NVVIOCONFIG_SYNCDELAY | \
17692 NVVIOCONFIG_CSCOVERRIDE | \
17693 NVVIOCONFIG_ANCTIMECODEGENERATION | \
17694 NVVIOCONFIG_COMPOSITE | \
17695 NVVIOCONFIG_ALPHAKEYCOMPOSITE | \
17696 NVVIOCONFIG_COMPOSITE_Y | \
17697 NVVIOCONFIG_COMPOSITE_CR | \
17698 NVVIOCONFIG_COMPOSITE_CB | \
17699 NVVIOCONFIG_ANC_PARITY_COMPUTATION)
17700
17701
17702 #define NVVIOCONFIG_RMMODESET_FIELDS ( NVVIOCONFIG_SIGNALFORMAT | \
17703 NVVIOCONFIG_DATAFORMAT | \
17704 NVVIOCONFIG_SYNCSOURCEENABLE | \
17705 NVVIOCONFIG_FRAMELOCKENABLE | \
17706 NVVIOCONFIG_COMPOSITESYNCTYPE | \
17707 NVVIOCONFIG_ANC_AUDIO_REPEAT)
17708
17709
17711// No members can be deleted from below structure. Only add new members at the
17712// end of the structure.
17713typedef struct _NVVIOOUTPUTCONFIG_V1
17714{
17715 NVVIOSIGNALFORMAT signalFormat;
17716 NVVIODATAFORMAT dataFormat;
17717 NVVIOOUTPUTREGION outputRegion;
17718 NVVIOOUTPUTAREA outputArea;
17719 NVVIOCOLORCONVERSION colorConversion;
17720 NVVIOGAMMACORRECTION gammaCorrection;
17721 NvU32 syncEnable;
17722 NVVIOSYNCSOURCE syncSource;
17723 NVVIOSYNCDELAY syncDelay;
17724 NVVIOCOMPSYNCTYPE compositeSyncType;
17725 NvU32 frameLockEnable;
17726 NvU32 psfSignalFormat;
17727 NvU32 enable422Filter;
17728 NvU32 compositeTerminate;
17729 NvU32 enableDataIntegrityCheck;
17730 NvU32 cscOverride;
17731 NvU32 flipQueueLength;
17732 NvU32 enableANCTimeCodeGeneration;
17733 NvU32 enableComposite;
17734 NvU32 enableAlphaKeyComposite;
17735 NVVIOCOMPOSITERANGE compRange;
17736 NvU8 reservedData[256];
17737 NvU32 enableFullColorRange;
17738 NvU32 enableRGBData;
17739} NVVIOOUTPUTCONFIG_V1;
17740
17741typedef struct _NVVIOOUTPUTCONFIG_V2
17742{
17743 NVVIOSIGNALFORMAT signalFormat;
17744 NVVIODATAFORMAT dataFormat;
17745 NVVIOOUTPUTREGION outputRegion;
17746 NVVIOOUTPUTAREA outputArea;
17747 NVVIOCOLORCONVERSION colorConversion;
17748 NVVIOGAMMACORRECTION gammaCorrection;
17749 NvU32 syncEnable;
17750 NVVIOSYNCSOURCE syncSource;
17751 NVVIOSYNCDELAY syncDelay;
17752 NVVIOCOMPSYNCTYPE compositeSyncType;
17753 NvU32 frameLockEnable;
17754 NvU32 psfSignalFormat;
17755 NvU32 enable422Filter;
17756 NvU32 compositeTerminate;
17757 NvU32 enableDataIntegrityCheck;
17758 NvU32 cscOverride;
17759 NvU32 flipQueueLength;
17760 NvU32 enableANCTimeCodeGeneration;
17761 NvU32 enableComposite;
17762 NvU32 enableAlphaKeyComposite;
17763 NVVIOCOMPOSITERANGE compRange;
17764 NvU8 reservedData[256];
17765 NvU32 enableFullColorRange;
17766 NvU32 enableRGBData;
17767 NVVIOANCPARITYCOMPUTATION ancParityComputation;
17768} NVVIOOUTPUTCONFIG_V2;
17769
17770typedef struct _NVVIOOUTPUTCONFIG_V3
17771{
17772 NVVIOSIGNALFORMAT signalFormat;
17773 NVVIODATAFORMAT dataFormat;
17774 NVVIOOUTPUTREGION outputRegion;
17775 NVVIOOUTPUTAREA outputArea;
17776 NVVIOCOLORCONVERSION colorConversion;
17777 NVVIOGAMMACORRECTION gammaCorrection;
17778 NvU32 syncEnable;
17779 NVVIOSYNCSOURCE syncSource;
17780 NVVIOSYNCDELAY syncDelay;
17781 NVVIOCOMPSYNCTYPE compositeSyncType;
17782 NvU32 frameLockEnable;
17783 NvU32 psfSignalFormat;
17784 NvU32 enable422Filter;
17785 NvU32 compositeTerminate;
17786 NvU32 enableDataIntegrityCheck;
17787 NvU32 cscOverride;
17788 NvU32 flipQueueLength;
17789 NvU32 enableANCTimeCodeGeneration;
17790 NvU32 enableComposite;
17791 NvU32 enableAlphaKeyComposite;
17792 NVVIOCOMPOSITERANGE compRange;
17793 NvU8 reservedData[256];
17794 NvU32 enableFullColorRange;
17795 NvU32 enableRGBData;
17796 NVVIOANCPARITYCOMPUTATION ancParityComputation;
17797 NvU32 enableAudioBlanking;
17798} NVVIOOUTPUTCONFIG_V3;
17799
17801typedef struct _NVVIOSTREAM
17802{
17803 NvU32 bitsPerComponent;
17804 NVVIOCOMPONENTSAMPLING sampling;
17805 NvU32 expansionEnable;
17806 NvU32 numLinks;
17807 struct
17808 {
17809 NvU32 jack;
17810 NvU32 channel;
17811 } links[NVAPI_MAX_VIO_LINKS_PER_STREAM];
17812} NVVIOSTREAM;
17813
17815typedef struct _NVVIOINPUTCONFIG
17816{
17817 NvU32 numRawCaptureImages;
17819 NVVIOSIGNALFORMAT signalFormat;
17821 NvU32 numStreams;
17822 NVVIOSTREAM streams[NVAPI_MAX_VIO_STREAMS];
17823 NvU32 bTestMode;
17826} NVVIOINPUTCONFIG;
17827
17828typedef struct _NVVIOCONFIG_V1
17829{
17830 NvU32 version;
17831 NvU32 fields;
17832 NVVIOCONFIGTYPE nvvioConfigType;
17833 union
17834 {
17835 NVVIOINPUTCONFIG inConfig;
17836 NVVIOOUTPUTCONFIG_V1 outConfig;
17837 }vioConfig;
17838} NVVIOCONFIG_V1;
17839
17840
17841typedef struct _NVVIOCONFIG_V2
17842{
17843 NvU32 version;
17844 NvU32 fields;
17845 NVVIOCONFIGTYPE nvvioConfigType;
17846 union
17847 {
17848 NVVIOINPUTCONFIG inConfig;
17849 NVVIOOUTPUTCONFIG_V2 outConfig;
17850 }vioConfig;
17851} NVVIOCONFIG_V2;
17852
17853typedef struct _NVVIOCONFIG_V3
17854{
17855 NvU32 version;
17856 NvU32 fields;
17857 NVVIOCONFIGTYPE nvvioConfigType;
17858 union
17859 {
17860 NVVIOINPUTCONFIG inConfig;
17861 NVVIOOUTPUTCONFIG_V3 outConfig;
17862 }vioConfig;
17863} NVVIOCONFIG_V3;
17864typedef NVVIOOUTPUTCONFIG_V3 NVVIOOUTPUTCONFIG;
17865typedef NVVIOCONFIG_V3 NVVIOCONFIG;
17866
17867#define NVVIOCONFIG_VER1 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(NVVIOCONFIG_V1,1)
17868#define NVVIOCONFIG_VER2 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(NVVIOCONFIG_V2,2)
17869#define NVVIOCONFIG_VER3 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(NVVIOCONFIG_V3,3)
17870#define NVVIOCONFIG_VER NVVIOCONFIG_VER3

18182typedef enum _NVVIOPCILINKRATE
18183{
18184 NVVIOPCILINKRATE_UNKNOWN = 0,
18185 NVVIOPCILINKRATE_GEN1 = 1, //<! 2.5 Gbps.
18186 NVVIOPCILINKRATE_GEN2 = 2, //<! 5 Gbps.
18187 NVVIOPCILINKRATE_GEN3 = 3, //<! 8 Gbps.
18188}NVVIOPCILINKRATE;

18195 NVVIOPCILINKWIDTH_x4 = 4,
18196 NVVIOPCILINKWIDTH_x8 = 8,
18197 NVVIOPCILINKWIDTH_x16 = 16,
18198}NVVIOPCILINKWIDTH;

18212} NVVIOPCIINFO_V1;

18219//
18220// FUNCTION NAME: NvAPI_VIO_GetPCIInfo()
18221//
18222// DESCRIPTION: This API gets PCI information of the attached SDI(input) capture card.
18223//
18224// PARAMETERS: hVioHandle (IN) - Handle to SDI capture card.
18225// pVioPCIInfo (OUT) - PCI information of the attached SDI capture card.
18226//
18230//
18232//
18234__nvapi_deprecated_function("Do not use this function - it is deprecated in release 440.")
18235NVAPI_INTERFACE NvAPI_VIO_GetPCIInfo(__in NvVioHandle hVioHandle,
18236 __inout NVVIOPCIINFO* pVioPCIInfo);

18601typedef struct _NVAPI_STEREO_CAPS
18602{
18603 NvU32 version;
18604 NvU32 supportsWindowedModeOff : 1;
18605 NvU32 supportsWindowedModeAutomatic : 1;
18606 NvU32 supportsWindowedModePersistent : 1;
18607 NvU32 reserved : 29; // must be 0
18608 NvU32 reserved2[3]; // must be 0
18609} NVAPI_STEREO_CAPS_V1;
18610
18611#define NVAPI_STEREO_CAPS_VER1 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(NVAPI_STEREO_CAPS,1)
18612#define NVAPI_STEREO_CAPS_VER NVAPI_STEREO_CAPS_VER1
18613
18614typedef NVAPI_STEREO_CAPS_V1 NVAPI_STEREO_CAPS;

19162 NVDRS_STRING_TYPE,

19171 NVDRS_DEFAULT_PROFILE_LOCATION

19180 NvU32 reserved4 : 1;

19195 NvU32 reserved19 : 1;

19210
19212typedef struct _NVDRS_BINARY_SETTING
19213{
19214 NvU32 valueLength;
19215 NvU8 valueData[NVAPI_BINARY_DATA_MAX];
19216} NVDRS_BINARY_SETTING;
19217
19218typedef struct _NVDRS_SETTING_VALUES
19219{
19220 NvU32 version;
19221 NvU32 numSettingValues;
19222 NVDRS_SETTING_TYPE settingType;
19223 union
19224 {
19225 NvU32 u32DefaultValue;
19226 NVDRS_BINARY_SETTING binaryDefaultValue;
19228 NvAPI_UnicodeString wszDefaultValue;
19229 };
19230 union
19231 {
19232 NvU32 u32Value;
19233 NVDRS_BINARY_SETTING binaryValue;
19234 NvAPI_UnicodeString wszValue;
19235 }settingValues[NVAPI_SETTING_MAX_VALUES];
19236} NVDRS_SETTING_VALUES;
19237
19239#define NVDRS_SETTING_VALUES_VER MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(NVDRS_SETTING_VALUES,1)
19240
19241typedef struct _NVDRS_SETTING_V1
19242{
19243 NvU32 version;
19244 NvAPI_UnicodeString settingName;
19245 NvU32 settingId;
19246 NVDRS_SETTING_TYPE settingType;
19247 NVDRS_SETTING_LOCATION settingLocation;
19248 NvU32 isCurrentPredefined;
19250 NvU32 isPredefinedValid;
19251 union
19252 {
19253 NvU32 u32PredefinedValue;
19254 NVDRS_BINARY_SETTING binaryPredefinedValue;
19257 NvAPI_UnicodeString wszPredefinedValue;
19258 };
19259 union
19260 {
19261 NvU32 u32CurrentValue;
19262 NVDRS_BINARY_SETTING binaryCurrentValue;
19265 NvAPI_UnicodeString wszCurrentValue;
19266 };
19267} NVDRS_SETTING_V1;
19268
19270#define NVDRS_SETTING_VER1 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(NVDRS_SETTING_V1, 1)
19271
19272typedef NVDRS_SETTING_V1 NVDRS_SETTING;
19273#define NVDRS_SETTING_VER NVDRS_SETTING_VER1
19274

19280 NvAPI_UnicodeString userFriendlyName;
19281 NvAPI_UnicodeString launcher;
19282} NVDRS_APPLICATION_V1;

19306 NvU32 reserved:30;

20041typedef struct
20042{
20043 NvU32 version;
20044 NvU32 vendorId;
20045 NvU32 deviceId;
20046 NvAPI_ShortString szVendorName;
20047 NvAPI_ShortString szChipsetName;
20048 NvU32 flags;
20049 NvU32 subSysVendorId;
20050 NvU32 subSysDeviceId;
20051 NvAPI_ShortString szSubSysVendorName;
20052 NvU32 HBvendorId;
20053 NvU32 HBdeviceId;
20054 NvU32 HBsubSysVendorId;
20055 NvU32 HBsubSysDeviceId;
20056
20057} NV_CHIPSET_INFO_v4;
20058
20059typedef struct
20060{
20061 NvU32 version;
20062 NvU32 vendorId;
20063 NvU32 deviceId;
20064 NvAPI_ShortString szVendorName;
20065 NvAPI_ShortString szChipsetName;
20066 NvU32 flags;
20067 NvU32 subSysVendorId;
20068 NvU32 subSysDeviceId;
20069 NvAPI_ShortString szSubSysVendorName;
20070} NV_CHIPSET_INFO_v3;
20071
20072typedef enum
20073{
20074 NV_CHIPSET_INFO_HYBRID = 0x00000001,
20075} NV_CHIPSET_INFO_FLAGS;
20076
20077typedef struct
20078{
20079 NvU32 version;
20080 NvU32 vendorId;
20081 NvU32 deviceId;
20082 NvAPI_ShortString szVendorName;
20083 NvAPI_ShortString szChipsetName;
20084 NvU32 flags;
20085} NV_CHIPSET_INFO_v2;
20086
20087typedef struct
20088{
20089 NvU32 version; //structure version
20090 NvU32 vendorId; //vendor ID
20091 NvU32 deviceId; //device ID
20092 NvAPI_ShortString szVendorName; //vendor Name
20093 NvAPI_ShortString szChipsetName; //device Name
20094} NV_CHIPSET_INFO_v1;
20095
20096#define NV_CHIPSET_INFO_VER_1 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(NV_CHIPSET_INFO_v1,1)
20097#define NV_CHIPSET_INFO_VER_2 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(NV_CHIPSET_INFO_v2,2)
20098#define NV_CHIPSET_INFO_VER_3 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(NV_CHIPSET_INFO_v3,3)
20099#define NV_CHIPSET_INFO_VER_4 MAKE_NVAPI_VERSION(NV_CHIPSET_INFO_v4,4)

20242typedef struct _NV_DISPLAY_DRIVER_INFO
20243{

20247 NvU32 bIsDCHDriver : 1;
20250 NvU32 bIsNVIDIAStudioPackage : 1;
20252 NvU32 bIsNVIDIAGameReadyPackage : 1;
20254 NvU32 bIsNVIDIARTXProductionBranchPackage : 1;
20256 NvU32 bIsNVIDIARTXNewFeatureBranchPackage : 1;
20259 NvU32 reserved : 27;
20260} NV_DISPLAY_DRIVER_INFO_V1;
20261

20263typedef NV_DISPLAY_DRIVER_INFO_V1 NV_DISPLAY_DRIVER_INFO;
20264#define NV_DISPLAY_DRIVER_INFO_VER NV_DISPLAY_DRIVER_INFO_VER1
